2a1(mdo sde): Ar+ya bud+d+ha d+harmA
2a2(mdo sde): bod skad du
2a3(mdo sde): d+ya/ re rA nga
2b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa
2b2(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa
2b3(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de ni byang chub
3a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas/ byang
3a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' batshig 'i snyam dus ye/ kha nis
3a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam
3b1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
3b2(mdo sde): kyi/ sngon gyi smon lam las byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab
3b3(mdo sde): snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ de bzhin
3b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni
4a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung
4a2(mdo sde): ba bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
4a3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab
4a4(mdo sde): snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ de bzhin
4b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom
4b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab snyam
4b3(mdo sde): kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
4b4(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
4b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi/ mi chags par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs
5a1(mdo sde): bya/ rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa
5a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
5a3(mdo sde): de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ud pa
5a4(mdo sde): la'i snying po la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs byin du brlabs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye she
5a5(mdo sde): kyi shugs su gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brdza
5b1(mdo sde): kyis kun du khyab par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la gnas par gyur/ sangs rgyas
5b2(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug cing 'bab pa dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
5b3(mdo sde): gyi yul la zhugs par gyur/ chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa/ med bcu rdul yas la gnas
5b4(mdo sde): par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu shes par gyur/ sangs rgyas
5b5(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi tshul du brjod du med pa la spyod cing sgrub par gyur to// de nas ud pa la'i snying po/ byang chub
5b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par rtogs shing shes nas/ yid la chags med pa'i dbyangasu
6a1(mdo sde): bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang /
6a2(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa yang sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su rtogs shing //
6a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang snying rje chen po'i go ca chen po bgos pa nas/ sems can thams cad la lta zhing
6a4(mdo sde): yongs su sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor brtsams pa/
6a5(mdo sde): dang / skad cig ma'i mthar song ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mi
6a6(mdo sde): zad pa mthong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du gyur pa dang / gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa
6b1(mdo sde): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rtogs nas/ ud pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ pad ma'i snying
6b2(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod pa dpag tu med do// kye rgyal
6b3(mdo sde): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul chen po la gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ skra'i
6b4(mdo sde): mtshan thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa brnyes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsam
6b5(mdo sde): pa dang ldan zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi brjod du med par
6b6(mdo sde): bstan to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bsam du med pa la gnas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs
6b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi dbyangs sgra dpag tu med par 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing khong du
7a1(mdo sde): chud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog sangs rgyas so// kye rgyal
7a2(mdo sde): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' sgribs pa med pa la 'jug pa mdor bsdus pa'o// kye rgyal
7a3(mdo sde): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang
7a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rnam par dag cing ma brnyogs
7a5(mdo sde): par/ thams cad du 'gro ba yangs pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ chos thams cad la chags pa med
7a6(mdo sde): pa'i spyan/ mtha' dang dbus med pas/ spyan mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
7a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan/ mtha' dang dbus med pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par gsan pa
7b1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shangs kyi mched mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' mchog brnyes pa
7b2(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags che zhing bsrab pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pas/ chos thams cad kyi
7b3(mdo sde): dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pas/ las kyi lhag ma ma lus
7b4(mdo sde): zhing / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi/ sems kyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston cing dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
7b5(mdo sde): kyi yid kyi las mtha' dang dbus med pas/ chos kyi skur dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas/ rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang /
7b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pas/ sangs rgyas
7b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / cho 'phrul mi zad pa bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
7b8(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pas/ brjod du med pa'i brgyan/ byin gyis brlabs shing / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
8a1(mdo sde): zhing du/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ston pa dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub
8a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang / chos yongs su rdzogs
8a3(mdo sde): shing / ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang / chos yongs su rdzogs pas/ chos thams cad kyis mngon par byang chub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/
8a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o// /
8a5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe
8a6(mdo sde): na/ skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams
8a7(mdo sde): cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshe ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ mngon par byung ba ston pa dang / skad cig la
8a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub kyi shing drung na zhugs shing mngon par byang chub par ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams
8b1(mdo sde): cad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin
8b2(mdo sde): cing dal ba'i dus/ ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas/ mgu bar mdzad pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can rnams ji lta
8b3(mdo sde): ba 'dul ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de/ brjod du med
8b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing / khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
8b5(mdo sde): da/ thams cad du rnam par dag pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
8b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus dang / dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang / des gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs mngon par mkhyen pa ste/
8b7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs
8b8(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
9a1(mdo sde): rgya ba las mi 'da' ba dang / dus de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin
9a2(mdo sde): pa las mi 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung ston pa dang / sangs
9a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin cho 'phrul ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/
9a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams ji ltar dad pa bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i byin rlabs ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ btang snyoms
9a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
9a6(mdo sde): rnams das mkhyen nas/ ji ltar na rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams das mkhyen nas/ nyon mongs shing
9a7(mdo sde): gdul dka' ba'i sems can la mi brtsam pas 'dul ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis
9a8(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ dus las mi 'da' ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
9b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams
9b2(mdo sde): thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig
9b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang / sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang / phyogs gcig gis gnas dmigs pas/ 'jig rten gyi
9b4(mdo sde): khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang / ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med par chud pa dang / dus mkhyen nas sems
9b5(mdo sde): gcig bskyed pas/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing / gom pa gcig la de kho na
9b6(mdo sde): nyid ston pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'dre zhing 'das pa
9b7(mdo sde): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo gcig ste gnyis su med par spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul mtshungs
9b8(mdo sde): pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu ste/
10a1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon par sgrub pa dang lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen/
10a2(mdo sde): pa dang chos thams cad gnyis su med pas/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bsgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la/ sems
10a3(mdo sde): can 'dul ba'i mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
10a4(mdo sde): khams kyi yul thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang / 'gyur ba mngon par bsgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / yul thams cad la mngon par
10a5(mdo sde): 'dra mi byed cing / las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par bsgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i dbyings su mngon par bsgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / kun
10a6(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba 'ang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa la skye zhing / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid
10a7(mdo sde): rkyen dang 'du ba 'tshogs te byung ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal po'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par
10a8(mdo sde): sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o// bcu gang zhe na/ dus gsum thams cad/
10b1(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skur rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzungs dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
10b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi/ sangs rgyas bcom
10b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su
10b5(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / des thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs shing / rtag tu mnyam par phan par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad 'dul ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang /
10b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / skad cig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
10b8(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa dang / nyi ma gcig la dus gsum gyi bskal pa/
11a1(mdo sde): thams cad rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
11a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams su rtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
11a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi rgol ba bcom zhing gtor ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / gzhan mur 'dug dang pha rol rgol
11a4(mdo sde): ba thams cad tshar gcod pa shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sems can thams cad 'dul zhing tshim par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
11a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu phigs shing mkhyen pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin
11a7(mdo sde): tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs
11a8(mdo sde): rnam par phye ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ dbyangs
11b1(mdo sde): kyi yan lag thams cad kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / sems can gti mug med cing dang
11b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig bzhin dra ba spu'i khams
11b3(mdo sde): rnams thams cad nas/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas/ 'di
11b4(mdo sde): bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang / mnyam pa'i sems can 'byin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi//
11b5(mdo sde): shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas gcig gis rab tu phra ba'i rdul
11b6(mdo sde): la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis tsher bas chos kyi
11b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor zhing / sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la/ gtong ba med kyang gnod pa med cing / 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang gnod pa med de/ rab tu 'dra
11b8(mdo sde): ba'i rdul de rgyas par byas pa med/ 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu byas pa'ang med pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs shing mkhyen nas/ gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
12a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod pa dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o// mun pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par
12a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rab rib med pa/ rnam par rab rib med pa'i gnas la sems can pha rol 'dzud
12a3(mdo sde): pa dang / de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos
12a4(mdo sde): kyi bla re chen po bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o// klo rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs
12a5(mdo sde): rdo rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i thams cad du kha na ma
12a6(mdo sde): tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid shin tu bsgrubs te/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam
12a7(mdo sde): par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rigs sngon nas mtho bas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
12a8(mdo sde): kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
12b1(mdo sde): shes pa la mi gnas shing / phyi ma'i mtha' mi gnas pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba/ thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa dang /
12b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la gnas pa/ bcom zhing dus gsum la gnas par spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
12b3(mdo sde): che ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna tshogs kyi grang ba med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyan cig pa'i ngo bo ste/
12b4(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad
12b5(mdo sde): mi shes pas/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
12b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba dang / thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sems can 'dul ba'i dus kyi dbang gis sangs
12b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzungs dang / kha dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chags pa med par bzhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa med par bzhi brnyes te/ bag tsha ba
13a1(mdo sde): med par gnas nas khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/ stag chen po ltar rgol ba rnam par gnon cing / me mar lta bu'i kun du rtog pas/
13a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba/ thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas
13a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ste/ bskal pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/ 'on kyang ming mang po rnam par rig pas sems
13a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sbyin gnas spong ste/ ji ltar bzhags pa bzhin no// de srid du yun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas
13a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sbyin gnas skrun pa ni/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i thams cad du kha na ma tho
13a6(mdo sde): ba med cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i 'jig rten/
13a7(mdo sde): gyi khams na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na/ sku ston par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
13a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba ste/
13b1(mdo sde): thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
13b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon gyi smon lam shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma chags
13b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can thams cad phung po las nges par 'byung bar mdzad
13b4(mdo sde): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yog 'khor shin tu rnam
13b5(mdo sde): bar dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam
13b6(mdo sde): par dag cing / shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku dang shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
13b7(mdo sde): bsgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa
13b8(mdo sde): dang / rnam par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyed pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o// khre rgyas
14a1(mdo sde): ba'i sras dus thams cad du/ 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/
14a2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la/ dus thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang / dus thams
14a3(mdo sde): cad du sems cad shes kyi sems cad la chos ston pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas la sems rab tu dang ba'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
14a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs par mdzad pa dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad
14a5(mdo sde): la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa
14a6(mdo sde): dang / dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam par
14a7(mdo sde): sprul pa la zhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sangs rgyas sna tshogs su sprul par bzhags pa dang / dus thams cad
14a8(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni dus thams cad du/ 'jig rten
14b1(mdo sde): gyi yul khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
14b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs
14b3(mdo sde): ba'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs
14b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba chad med pa bsam gyis mi
14b5(mdo sde): khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas
14b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog gi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen nas/ sngon
14b7(mdo sde): gyi mtha' nas smon lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba thams cad la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
14b8(mdo sde): pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can ma lus pa'i ris thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes kyi
15a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi nod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho
15a2(mdo sde): mi zad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa bcu'o// /
15a3(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o// bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
15a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin cing / mngon par 'byung ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad mi mkhyen pa
15a5(mdo sde): mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams tshad med pa'i stobs bcu
15a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas
15a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar bzhags pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'gro ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs
15a8(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhags pas 'dul ba'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar
15b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbang ba'i spyan dang / gang 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems
15b2(mdo sde): can brtul te smin par mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir/ sangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par ston pa'i spyan te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs
15b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par
15b4(mdo sde): ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod
15b5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom
15b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can thams cad la gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i nan
15b7(mdo sde): tan mtha' yas pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa ston pa la dgod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
15b8(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus
16a1(mdo sde): thams cad la sdud pa dang / 'gyur ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par/
16a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa bzhin ston pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i thams cad na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
16a3(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de dang / de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskal par 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus
16a4(mdo sde): nas yongs su snang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rig pa'i mtha' yas par ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha'
16a5(mdo sde): yas par ston pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
16a6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku bstan pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzan pa mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gis kyang / sems can
16a7(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzungs pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs
16a8(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gis kyang
16b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi yul gyi dbang gis rtsom pa'i yul thams cad kyis kyang / sems/
16b2(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
16b3(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing rtsom pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs
16b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas kyang / sems
16b5(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
16b6(mdo sde): bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam btab pa dang /
16b7(mdo sde): gnyis su med par bshad pa ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing ma zhum
16b8(mdo sde): bar phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro zhing yon tan gyi thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gnyis so// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
17a1(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dul bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na/ yang mi bzhugs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
17a2(mdo sde): gshegs na/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gsum mo// sems can gyi sems mi 'phrogs pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa dang / sems can sems rab tu dang /
17a3(mdo sde): ba la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba
17a4(mdo sde): yang ma yin 'byung ba yang ma yin par gang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
17a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi sems mi 'jig ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po lnga'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus nas/
17a6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen du bsngo bar 'jug cing / 'jig rten gyi phyir mi spyod ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po drug go/ thog mar sems kyi sangs rgyas thams
17a7(mdo sde): cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las slob pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen par sngo zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs
17a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no//
17b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun tu snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i 'od snang ba thams cad
17b2(mdo sde): mtshungs par thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi snying po brgyad do// 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spong ba dang / 'jig
17b3(mdo sde): rten gyi dga' ba la mi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas
17b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dgu'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' thub dang /
17b5(mdo sde): dka' thub kyi sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba la brtson pas/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyi reg
17b6(mdo sde): pas reg cing / stobs dag sa bcu'i bar gyi mthar phyung ba ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos kyi snying po bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17b8(mdo sde): 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
18a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad na bzhugs par yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad/
18a2(mdo sde): na 'chag cing bzhags pa yang mi chags par spod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na chos ston pa yang mi chags par spod
18a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dang dga' ldan gnas su gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
18a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
18a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa yang / mi chags par spyod pa dang / sems can ma lus
18a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi spyod pa la rnam par gzigs shing / sems kyi skad cig la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /
18a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa chen po yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas
18a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing / sems can tshad med bcu rdal yas ma lus pa thams cad la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
18b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' bsdus pa yang mi chags par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/ bcu
18b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//
18b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yan lag drug cu mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su gzung brgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mtha'
18b5(mdo sde): dang mu med pa dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa/ brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang don dam tshig dang / 'bru rab tu dang ba dang / 'jigs pa chen pos
18b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang snang ba dang / shes par
18b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs kyi rim par so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
18b8(mdo sde): kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin
19a1(mdo sde): chen pos shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis brgyan cing shin tu brgyan te/ chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul ba/
19a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yan lag brnyes te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi skad
19a3(mdo sde): cig ma cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis dus gsum ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen
19a4(mdo sde): pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i 'od bye ba khrag
19a5(mdo sde): khrig rab tu btang nas 'od gzer brjod du med pa cig nas cig tu 'od zer gyi dra bas skor cing zhing med rdul yas ma lus pa thams cad du snang bar byas pa/ 'jig rten
19a6(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs pa ston pa/ 'dzum pa ston pa'i zhal sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs du ma kha dog brgya stong du ma bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs
19a7(mdo sde): med pa 'byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la/ snang bas shes par byed cing bla na med
19a8(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs par chud par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog pa/ brjod du med
19b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhags pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dka' ba med par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa
19b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa med par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
19b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
19b4(mdo sde): sku sgribs pa med cing rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la ma chags pa mtha' med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med par chud par 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa/
19b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyis rjes su 'brang ba 'jig rten thams cad 'jig rten las 'das par spyod pa'i 'jug pa tshig gi lam chad cing brjod du med par chud pa/
19b6(mdo sde): phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
19b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'od tshad med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i 'od brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen/
19b8(mdo sde): kun nas mi 'phrogs pa'i 'od 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i 'od chad med pa'i bsgribs pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad khengs pa ltar/
20a1(mdo sde): gyur ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan bla na med pa mchog dam pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
20a2(mdo sde): kha dog mtha' yas pa/ kha dog 'tsher ba/ kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/ kha dog tshad med pa/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba
20a3(mdo sde): bzhin du rnam par rigs par byed pa'i kha dog ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlogs pa'i kha dog dang / kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pas de las gzhan
20a4(mdo sde): pa'i kha dog dang / khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam
20a5(mdo sde): pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba shin tu rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che
20a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba las byung ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa chos thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan
20a7(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgrib pa med cing ngogs rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi rigs dang / gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis brgyan pa shin
20b1(mdo sde): tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyam rangs pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba blta bas mi ngoms pa/ thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin
20b2(mdo sde): gnas dang / skyabs ming gi mchog bla na med pa so sor 'dzin pa rnams la thugs brtse zhing phan par bzhed pas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i byin gyis rlobs
20b3(mdo sde): pa bsod nams chen pos 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha' yas pa'i zhing sems can thams cad la yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam
20b4(mdo sde): bar 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang bsod num+bas kyi mtha'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o// kye rgyal
20b5(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa mchog/
20b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa// / bam po gnyis pa/
20b7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gis chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag
20b8(mdo sde): po'i dbang gis/ chos thams cad snang bar dbang mdzad pa dang / mtha' med pa'i tshig dang / 'bru la stsogs pa chags pa med pas chos ma lus pa thams cad longs
21a1(mdo sde): su ston pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gis chos dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
21a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa 'dul zhing yongs su sbyin pa de ltar smon lam dang chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gis chos gnyis
21a3(mdo sde): so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang / sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa
21a4(mdo sde): med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'deg pa dang / 'jig pa dang /
21a5(mdo sde): sdud pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig dang / phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang / sems can gyi khams su kun nas gti mi
21a6(mdo sde): mug cing the tsom med de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos gsum mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma cig la
21a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ rgyan sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /
21a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhab lhub dang / rgyan ston pa dang grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lugs
21b1(mdo sde): su 'chad cing lbab lhub dang / rgyan thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun
21b2(mdo sde): 'brangs par byin gyis rlobs pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gis chos bzhi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
21b3(mdo sde): kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na/ sems can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i bskal pa/ skyil mo krung mi 'jig par gang zag
21b4(mdo sde): de la dgongs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / thugs la skyo ba mi mnga' zhing 'dul ba'i dus de las mi 'da' ba ste/ ji ltar gang zag re re la yang de bzhin du
21b5(mdo sde): rim pa rim pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar tshe la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhags kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu
21b6(mdo sde): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi phyir rim pa rims pas rab
21b7(mdo sde): tu sbyong ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos lnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos/ sems kyi
21b8(mdo sde): skad cig ma la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med brgya
22a1(mdo sde): rdul yal ma lus pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig tu thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
22a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rigs kyi dra ba bzlog cing / tshad med par gshegs te/ chos kyi dbyings ston pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ 'di ni sangs
22a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gis chos drug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos/ sems kyi skad cig ma la sems
22a4(mdo sde): can gyi khams 'dul ba'i phyir sems kyi skad cig ma la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang / 'di ltar mngon
22a5(mdo sde): du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas chos thams cad las mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'ang med/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/
22a6(mdo sde): slob pa'i sa la gnas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgribs pa med par rtogs shing rig pa yang med de/
22a7(mdo sde): sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing / dpag tu med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
22a8(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos gang spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
22b1(mdo sde): de snyan gyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de/ shangs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu smra ba/ gang shangs kyi skye mched
22b2(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de/ ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de/ sku'i skye mched kyis
22b3(mdo sde): kun tu sgrub/ gang sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de/ thugs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
22b4(mdo sde): pa de/ de'i bar gyis 'jig rten khams ma lus pa thams cad du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par phye ba ma brnyes te/ de
22b5(mdo sde): bzhin du rtsom pa re res sgrub cing sprul pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
22b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos brgyad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang pos/ rang gi skra'i ba spu'i gcig gi bu gar
22b7(mdo sde): sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bcug cing / nang
22b8(mdo sde): du 'dus par mdzad de de la sems can re res kyang / bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang / sems can de dag la gnod pa yang med/ kun tu gnod pa yang
23a1(mdo sde): med do// 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs te/ 'jig rten/
23a2(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag gis sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas 'byung bar shes shing / de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/ de'i
23a3(mdo sde): dbang gis sems can gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shes so// de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa gcig
23a4(mdo sde): nas gcig tu sangs rgyas su gyur te/ gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bskor zhing / gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
23a5(mdo sde): ston/ gcig nas gcig tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med
23a6(mdo sde): par snang bar byed/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i na mkha'i khams skabs med pa ston/ sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / thams cad skye ba'i skye mched
23a7(mdo sde): dang / bsgribs pa med pa dang / 'dod chags la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang
23a8(mdo sde): gi chos dgu'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te/ pad mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la
23b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa re re bzhugs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sku dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
23b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rol pa ston to// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig po de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sem
23b3(mdo sde): can gyi snying po re re sems kyi skad cig ma la byin gyis rlob po// sems kyi skad cig ma la gcig ji ltar ba bzhin du/ sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin
23b4(mdo sde): no// ji ltar pad mo'i le'u dang / rnam par dag cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / med bcu rdul yal brjod du
23b5(mdo sde): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim
23b6(mdo sde): pa dang / med bcu rdal yal brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang / sna tshogs nyid dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang / rigs bcu'i rdul yal tshad med pa/
23b7(mdo sde): dang / grangs med pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang / mi chags par ston pa dang / tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang / skad cig ma sna tshogs dang / gnas med pa dang / skad cig
23b8(mdo sde): ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tshad med par gshegs pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma cig la thams cad ston te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
24a1(mdo sde): 'das ched du mdzad pa ni mi mnga'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o//
24a2(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po'i dbang po chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
24a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang gis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan re res yongasu dag nas/ sangs rgyas brtsa
24a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
24a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
24a6(mdo sde): bar 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa yong su rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu
24a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul ba'i yongasasu smin par mdzad pa yongasasu rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
24a8(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pa yongasu rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
24b1(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas
24b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi
24b3(mdo sde): sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gti mug med par yongs su rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
24b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs nas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa tham
24b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab
24b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang
24b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa nas spros pa med pa dang / dge ba'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs
24b8(mdo sde): ston cing snang ba mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams
25a1(mdo sde): cad bltar med pa dang / phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang / ma bcings pa ma grol ba dang / gzung du med pa dang / reg par mi rung ba
25a2(mdo sde): dang / ma byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
25a3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / bdag med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' la/ chags pa med par dbang du gyur pa/ de la
25a4(mdo sde): dbang gi sa chen po brlabs te/ bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs
25a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa/ mtshan ma mngon par
25a6(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ mi chags pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/ grangs med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan
25a7(mdo sde): ma'i tshogs kyi sku rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang / spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa mun pa'i phung po yang dag par rab 'chad pa/
25a8(mdo sde): mun pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la/ sgron ma chen pos snang bas ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gsum pa'o//
25b1(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i lAm chags pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la mi
25b2(mdo sde): gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba/ snang bar mdzad pa/ brjod du med
25b3(mdo sde): bar ston pa/ de ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyir lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yun tu gzigs pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
25b4(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'dra mi byed pa/
25b5(mdo sde): blang ba med pa dang / rgyan med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu song ba/ ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod dang / grangs kyi sbyor ba las
25b6(mdo sde): log pa/ tshogs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang / sna tshogs kyi rings pa 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su so ba/ sgrib pa med
25b7(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba/ tshad med mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mthon par 'du 'dzi dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la
25b8(mdo sde): 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga pa'o// chos thams cad bltar med pa dang /
26a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs med par song ba/ rim pa med par song ba/ ma byung bar song ba/ mtshan nyid med par song ba/ sna tshogs med par song ba/ rgyan med/
26a2(mdo sde): par song ba/ blang ba med par song ba/ ngo bo nyid med par song zhing / chos thams cad mkhyen te/ chos kyi glong las nges par 'byin pa rab tu mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos
26a3(mdo sde): dang / mi 'gal bar mdzad pa/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par lta ba/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs te/ ye shes kyis ma lus par gzigs pa/ chos thams
26a4(mdo sde): cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'pho ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa drug
26a5(mdo sde): pa'o// dus gcig tu mtshan ma gcig tu na tshun rtogs shing mkhyen nas/ de chos gsha' mar 'jug pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par rnam par dag pa/
26a6(mdo sde): chos gsha' ma nyid dang / dus thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgyad dang / bskal pa sdud pa dang / 'gyur ba'i rjes
26a7(mdo sde): su 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ ldog pa yang ma yin/ tshad med pa'i dus dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gyi dus dang / snga dro dang / nyi ma phye'i dus dang / phye 'phred dang /
26a8(mdo sde): srod dang / nam gyi gung dang / tho rangs kyi dus dang / nyi ma dang grangs su rtogs pa'i dus dang / zhag bdun dang / zla ba med kyi dus dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo gcig dang /
26b1(mdo sde): lo brgya'i dus dang / bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med dus dang / phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i bar du chos ston to//
26b2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa yang med/ ldog pa yang med/ rgyun kyang mi gcod/ sbyor ba yang med/ 'tshams su yang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dor ba mi 'pho// mi g.yo
26b3(mdo sde): ring ba yang ma yin de mtha' la yang gnas pa ma yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
26b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang / so sor yang
26b5(mdo sde): dag par rig pa tshad med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig po gnas med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mtha'
26b6(mdo sde): yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / kun nas gzung ba med pa dang / de kho na so so yang dag par rig pa dang / tshig dang / tshul dang / rtog pa so//
26b7(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ji ltar bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po dang / ji ltar brtags pa'i chos
26b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / chos kyi gzhung gis 'tshams ston pa dang / de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang khar ma dang /
27a1(mdo sde): tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o// ming
27a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / ming dang / rigs dang / 'byung ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ming dang / 'byed pa dang / khams 'bar ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
27a3(mdo sde): 'das pa med pa'i ming dang / ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang / da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang / zhing med pa'i ming dang / chos med pa'i ming dang / yon tan
27a4(mdo sde): med pa'i ming dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa ma yin pa'i ming
27a5(mdo sde): dang / ma byung ba'i ming dang / mi 'gog pa'i ming dang / med pa'i ming / med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / gcig ma yin pa'i ming dang / rnam pa thams cad
27a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin/ brda' ba ma yin/ ngag gi lam gyi sgra skad dang bral ba/ sgra byung ba thams
27a7(mdo sde): cad kyis ma bsgrubs pa/ ma bskyed pa dang / sna tshogs su bskyed pa dang / rnam pa gcig ma yin pa dang / rnam pa mang po ma yin pa dang / smra ba thams cad
27a8(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ kun tu mi rtog pa'i yul mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su
27b1(mdo sde): rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa/ smra ba thams cad ma skyes par gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas
27b2(mdo sde): pa dgu'o// gzugs kyi chos thams cad skyes par mkhyen te/ tshor ba ma yin/ spros pa ma yin/ grangs ma yin/ 'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin//
27b3(mdo sde): len pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu mkhyen/ skye mched med par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings mi
27b4(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / chos thams cad ldang ba med de/ rang bzhin gyis na mkha' dang mnyam pa/ chos thams cad dben
27b5(mdo sde): pa/ lam ma yin pa/ rnam par smin pa ma yin pa/ spyod pa med pa las byung ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ grangs med par rtogs pa/ yod pa ma yin pa//
27b6(mdo sde): med pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa/ rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/ ming med pa/ gsha' ma ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/
27b7(mdo sde): yongs su mi gnas pa/ yongs su smin pa ma yin pa/ dul ba ma yin pa/ sems can med pa/ sems can med pa ma yin pa/ srog med pa/ srog med pa ma
27b8(mdo sde): yin pa/ rkyen med pa/ rkyen med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang 'du ba med pa ma yin par chos thams cad mkhyen te/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i
28a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ tshogs gsum la rnam par gnas pas/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang //
28a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po ste/
28a3(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
28a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang /
28a5(mdo sde): tshad med bzung bar mi nus pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu
28a6(mdo sde): ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
28a7(mdo sde): thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang / kha dog tshad med pa dang /
28a8(mdo sde): gzi brjid tshad med pa dang / snang ba tshad med pa dang / dbyangs tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa dang / sgra sgrogs pa/
28b1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyi yul chad med pa dang / mtha' dang 'jig rten du bcas pa
28b2(mdo sde): rjes su 'dzin pa dang / bdud du bcas tshangs par bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / skye dgu dang / lha dang mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig
28b3(mdo sde): rten rjes su 'dzin pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i spyod yul ba/ snying rje chen po la phyogs pas sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ gzhan mtho ris su
28b4(mdo sde): skye ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / sems can yongasu dag
28b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems
28b6(mdo sde): can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las byung ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang /
28b7(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang po'o// dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe dang bdag gi lus su skye ba dang /
28b8(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bur spyod pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la thug pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang / yul nam mkha' ltar chad med par song ba/
29a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa lta bur skye ba la ma chags pa/ smig rgyu ba dang mnyam par snang ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la 'brang ba/ gnas med/
29a2(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa bla re dang rgyan chen po'i mdzod/ bdag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang / sangs
29a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po ches mchod pa'i gnas chen po la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
29a4(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
29a5(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa chen po'i mdzod ston pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ye shes chen po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
29a6(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa dang / ma las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yul chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes pas kyang /
29a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs mtha' yas pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / grangs med pa'i
29a8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin chen po rnam par spyod cing mnyam par 'jog pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las bzhengs pas kyang / sangs
29b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma dang / spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar gyis kyang //
29b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sa 'di nas gnyis kyi bar du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyis 'jig rten gyi grangs las shes par ston pa dang /
29b3(mdo sde): gzi brjid sna tshogs kyis kyang / 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du/ sangs
29b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'gyur
29b5(mdo sde): ba dang / rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
29b6(mdo sde): thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang / 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten du/ sangs
29b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten kun dang / phyogs thams cad rgya mo'i rgyun dang / rigs kyis 'jig rten thams
29b8(mdo sde): cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / zhing dang dus ma lus pas 'jig rten du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin
30a1(mdo sde): pa ma lus pas 'jig rten gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs ma lus pas 'jig rten du/ sangs rgyas
30a2(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang / rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sprul pa chen po dang /
30a3(mdo sde): rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang mdzad pa mdzad pa de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa gnyis
30a4(mdo sde): pa'o// dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba thams cad dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems
30a5(mdo sde): can 'dul zhing rjes su chud pa byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la dgos pa'i blos ltar ston pa'i rjes
30a6(mdo sde): su song zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang bral zhing gzugs la gnas pa dang / gnas pa byed pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar
30a7(mdo sde): rtog pa rtog pa dang / srid pa thams cad dang / ming dang / srid pa 'byung ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims
30a8(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos slas ltar 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba/ byams pa chen pos sems yul
30b1(mdo sde): la so sor rtog pa dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten la mngon par dga' ba shes par byed pa dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang bsgyur zhing 'jug
30b2(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la rjes su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du/ lus mngon par
30b3(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang / thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / g.yog 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa nan tan byed pa dang / chos
30b4(mdo sde): ston cing smra bar brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po smod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtog pa dang / ji ltar spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par
30b5(mdo sde): smin pa sten pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / ji ltar yongasu
30b6(mdo sde): smin par 'dul ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa grangs med par mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las phyir mi ldog par ston pa dang /
30b7(mdo sde): spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyis snang bar byed pa dang / gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po skyes
30b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi srid mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang / sdang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang / sangs
31a1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par rig cing / sras kyi dbus na 'jug pa'i ston pa dang / de las mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus/
31a2(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pas gnod cing bsgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes
31a3(mdo sde): pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs la mkhas pa ste/ lus kyi las shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gi las mi 'gro
31a4(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i thar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can rnams kyi don
31a5(mdo sde): mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o// mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas
31a6(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i brgyan pa'i yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ 'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing / 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten mngon par
31a7(mdo sde): chags par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags par zlog par
31a8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i 'jig rten spyod du 'jug pa dang / don thams cad rjes su dran par
31b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang / khyim pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la
31b2(mdo sde): sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang /
31b3(mdo sde): ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor so sor rnyed par byed cing / sems can rnams kyi ma shes pa'i rab rib la lta ba dang / bdag bla na med pa'i bsod nam
31b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'das shing sangs rgyas las skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye dgu thams cad la
31b5(mdo sde): bsngags pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi don mthong bar ston pa dang / sems can rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang / sems can rnams la kha na
31b6(mdo sde): ma tho ba med pa'i sgo bsgrub tu 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal
31b7(mdo sde): mtshan kun tu sgreng bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o// mjed pa dang ye shes du ma dang
31b8(mdo sde): rab tu ldan pas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin nas/ byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ chos thams
32a1(mdo sde): cad thugs su chud de/ bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mdzod dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa/
32a2(mdo sde): thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs mi zad pa'i mthas mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang / tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pa/ thams cad mkhyen/
32a3(mdo sde): pa'i yul las rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'jig rten
32a4(mdo sde): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ spros pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
32a5(mdo sde): rig par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i med pa'i mchog rab tu brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
32a6(mdo sde): yang dag par khyab par smon lam la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la dgongs pa dang / zab mo'i byang chub sems dpa' la zab mo'i
32a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul brtsom pa dang / brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang zhing sna tshogs
32a8(mdo sde): kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul du
32b1(mdo sde): byas pa dang / sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
32b2(mdo sde): spyod pa'i mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing / yon tan thams cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed de 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du
32b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
32b4(mdo sde): thams cad du 'gro ba dang / yongs su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pas 'gro ba
32b5(mdo sde): dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa'i thams cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
32b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lnga'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/
32b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes par byed pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / ma thos pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pas
32b8(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra chen po'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang // mun pa med pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgo snang ba'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang
33a1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i ngos ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid bsgribs pa
33a2(mdo sde): med pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mtshan ma'i tshul
33a3(mdo sde): gyi 'khor lo dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos snang bar sad pa'i dus gsum du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas tham
33a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi cig tu sdug pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / de la stsogs pa grangs med pa'i rnams bye ba khrag
33a5(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// 'di ltar chos
33a6(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
33a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
33a8(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / klu'i rgyal blo brang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /
33b1(mdo sde): dri za'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i pho brang dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lto 'phye chen po'i/
33b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / sha za'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
33b3(mdo sde): ba mdzad de/ gang 'di grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yos zhing 'od gzer gyi snang bas/ long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni so sor sgra zos/
33b4(mdo sde): smyon pa rnams ni so sor dran pa rnyed/ gcer bu rnams ni so sor gos rnyed/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor bde ba thob/ sil snyan dang brdung ba rnams ma brdungs par/
33b5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang / brdungs pa ma brdungs pa dang / 'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang / brdungs pa'i sgra dang / bram ze sna tshogs mang po rnams
33b6(mdo sde): kyi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang / lta bas mi ngoms shing mi 'thun pa med pa'i gzugs kyi sku ston pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams
33b7(mdo sde): la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bstan pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / kun tu
33b8(mdo sde): gzigs dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par gshegs
34a1(mdo sde): pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / gzims pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems/
34a2(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / chos 'chad pa dang / cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas
34a3(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
34a4(mdo sde): can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten spyod pa grangs med pa thams cad dang /
34a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa drad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
34a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba dang / smra ba dang / de bzhin gshe
34a7(mdo sde): pa mthong ba dang / smra ba shin tu dkon pa dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnyes par bya ba dang /
34a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
34b1(mdo sde): gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa la rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa la rtog pa dang /
34b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pas kyang / 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar spyod pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi sems can thams
