34b3(mdo sde): cad laM sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de dag dad pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba'i las dang / rjes su ston pa dang / tshig tu 'byin
34b4(mdo sde): ba dang / yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang / sems dang bas sangs rgyas la sdug par sems pa'i sems can rnams la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34b5(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
34b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas spyod pa'i ro dang / sangs
34b7(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa la blta ba dang / ma 'ongs pa
34b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dad pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems
35a2(mdo sde): can rnams la yang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra zos pa'i sems can rnams la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
35a3(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa de/ de la stsogs pa mtha' med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
35a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sems can thams cad
35a5(mdo sde): kyi bsam pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la stsogs mi mnga' ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la/ 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/
35a6(mdo sde): yul las phyir mi ldog cing thugs rje chen po gtong ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba
35a7(mdo sde): thams cad la rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la gnas shing / dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa rnyed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdun pa'o// dgon pa na bzhags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhags pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs
35b1(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas spyod pa la bzhags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen
35b2(mdo sde): la gnas shing bzhugs pas na/ gcig pur dgyes pa na bzhugs pa dang / sku ltar mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang / ye shes zab mo gnas shing bzhugs pa dang /
35b3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang / sku'i spyod pa ltar med pa na bzhugs pa rgyun mi gcod pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes dang /
35b5(mdo sde): smon lam gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongasu tshol zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas klu yongasu tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
35b6(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas na mkha' lding yongasu tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongasu
35b7(mdo sde): tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
35b8(mdo sde): kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas yongasu tshol bas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / chos ston pas kyang
36a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /
36a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba
36a3(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang / 'jig rten gyi yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / 'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang /
36a4(mdo sde): yul ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo gcig bgrang
36a5(mdo sde): bar gnas na/ bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par bskal par gnas na/ bzhugs pa'i bar gyis kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
36a6(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o// khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang / dge ba'i
36a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnam par sbyangs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang / mos par gyur pa la sems can la 'jug
36a8(mdo sde): cing sgrub par gyur pa dang / dbang po rnams dul bar gyur pa dang / sems can dang / skye dgu thams cad la dad par gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad 'byung
36b1(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi
36b2(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'de' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod
36b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten mi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang bar mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byis pa'i dgos pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /
36b4(mdo sde): ngo bo ma tshang ba med par chos la 'jug pa snang bar byed pa dang / rtsa ba chad pa la srid pa'i mig snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams la skyo ba ston pa dang /
36b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la 'jig rten/
36b6(mdo sde): gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang / sems can rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
36b7(mdo sde): 'das rnams bltar mi snang ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing rnam par chud par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten spro ba ldang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas sems
36b8(mdo sde): rtsom pa dang ldan par 'jog pa dang / dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing lta ba rnam par dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems can rnams/ slong bar
37a1(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / dbang po spro ba zlog cing yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba thams cad sgrub par/
37a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang / skyo ba med pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtsams par
37a3(mdo sde): dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang / lus gyes pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sems can 'khrug
37a4(mdo sde): pa dang / mos pa rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o// kye de bzhin
37a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das na/ 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang / du ba dang / mya ngan zlos pa dang / mchi ma byung bar
37a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes pa dang / thugs rje chen po zhes pa dang / ded dpon chen po zhes pa dang / thugs brtse ba zhes pa dang /
37a7(mdo sde): lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa/ skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing
37a8(mdo sde): 'das par gyur ces pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung dka' zhes pa dang / rnam pa 'di lta bur smre sngags 'don/ mya ngan zlos shing sangs rgyas mthong
37b1(mdo sde): ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can gyi bsam pa dang / yid la byed par yongs
37b2(mdo sde): su med pa las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sku gdung dang / ring bsrel
37b3(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang ku dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas
37b4(mdo sde): thams cad mkha' ltar 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring srel byin gyis rlobs te/ rang gi sku bor nas tshad med grangs med bsam
37b5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing / gang 'di'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang ba'i
37b6(mdo sde): dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams
37b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi yongasu 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can
37b8(mdo sde): rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de gshegs pa la mchod par brtson pa'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/
38a1(mdo sde): mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs/ yul dang ljongs sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang / sangs rgyas/
38a2(mdo sde): kyi sku gdang bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod rten du byas shing / yul dang phyogs der lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
38a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang / 'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung dang / ring bsrel mcho
38a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang / ring bsrel dang / dbu dang / se mo do dang / mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs par mchod rten brtsig par 'gro ba/ 'gro ba thams
38a5(mdo sde): cad nges par sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la dad pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ yul dang phyogs de dang der gnas shing
38a6(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par bsam pas gnas nas/ sbyin pa sbyin zhing bsod nams byed par 'gyur te/ de dang de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/
38a7(mdo sde): rigs chen po mo sor rnyed par 'gyur/ longs spyod chen po dang / g.yeg 'khor rnam par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong
38a8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ ngan par mi ltung ba'i nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag sangs rgyas byung ba nas/ gti mug med pas bsgrub par 'gyur/ dkar po'i chos las
38b1(mdo sde): sor rdzogs par 'gyur/ khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ ji ltar theg pa la dad pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/
38b2(mdo sde): de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shed byas pa bzo ba so sor rnyed par 'gyur te/ phyir 'byung ba dang gnas dang / 'gon dang / skabs dang / dpung gnyen sangs
38b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin gnas
38b4(mdo sde): sbyong ste/ bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i sbyin gnas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du skye ste/ 'di lta bu'i rnam pa mang por sems can rnams
38b5(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod nams bya tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o//
38b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
38b7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
38b8(mdo sde): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bcas pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin no//
39a1(mdo sde): / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa// bam po gsum pa'o// kye rgyal
39a2(mdo sde): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo// chos kyi dbang po'i chos/ mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ni sangs
39a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad lung ston te/ mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i
39a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs med bcu rdul yal brjod du med par gshegs te/ mi gnyis pa dang / chos kyi don ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs
39a5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / 'byung
39a6(mdo sde): ba'i skad cig ma'i mtho'i ye shes mi gnyis shing / thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha' dang / da lta ra gnyis su med pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi nang
39a7(mdo sde): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
39a8(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba dang / rab tu 'jigs pa dang / rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa dang / log na thams ca
39b1(mdo sde): nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis su med pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / gcig
39b2(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyi mi gnyis par gshegs
39b3(mdo sde): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas
39b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid med pa la gnas pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa
39b5(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa mnyam pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag
39b6(mdo sde): tu sems mnyam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma nyams pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
39b7(mdo sde): sems can chags pa med par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing / mi 'jigs pa yang dag
39b8(mdo sde): pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas
40a1(mdo sde): pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu ste/
40a2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa'i grangs thams cad mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs
40a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ da ltar byung ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ngag thams cad kyi lam thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten
40a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'jug pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub
40a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
40a6(mdo sde): cad dang bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos
40a7(mdo sde): thams cad rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye she
40a8(mdo sde): mthong ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal
40b1(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom
40b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang / stobs dang / stobs tshad med pa dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang / bzod par dka' ba'i stobs dang / yongs
40b3(mdo sde): su ma nyams pa'i stobs dang / snying po'i stobs dang / mi phyed pa'i stobs dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / sems can
40b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mi 'phrog pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku'i pha rol
40b5(mdo sde): rgod pa thams cad kyis mig phyed pa dang / 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing / dug gis mi 'jigs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
40b6(mdo sde): khams thams cad tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas tshig pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang / 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'jig pa
40b7(mdo sde): dang / bdad thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi stobs dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
40b8(mdo sde): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i stobs dang / sha za dang / 'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang / sems can
41a1(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad dmag gi stobs kyis mi tshugs pa dang / ri rab lhun po'i ri dang / mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs
41a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan yang 'khor yug chen po'i ri dang / mnyam pa dang / gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i char 'bebs te/ de nas bcom ldan
41a3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu yang ma 'gul/ bag tsha bar yang ma gyur pa/ bzhud pa dang / bzhengs
41a4(mdo sde): pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba'i spyod lam sbed pa yang mi mnga' ste/ yul gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ji tsam du
41a5(mdo sde): bzhed pa kun tu de tsam du ma phab po// sangs rgyas kyi mngags pa la yang gtses par ma gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can la yang
41a6(mdo sde): gces par ma gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i
41a7(mdo sde): stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed pa nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchog ma lus pa rnam
41a8(mdo sde): cad kyi dbyings mchog ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / ri rang lhun po'i ri dang bcas/ kho ra khor yug dang / khor yug chen
41b1(mdo sde): po'i ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho'i ri dang / nags stug por bcas pa dang / sems can gnas pa'i gnas pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
41b2(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcug ste/ tha ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mthar bzung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
41b3(mdo sde): ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so// 'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gar bcug
41b4(mdo sde): nas/ tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste/ bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang bskal par gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
41b5(mdo sde): thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/ skyo ba mi skye stobs dang mthu nyams par mi 'gyur/ spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i/
41b6(mdo sde): sras 'di lta ste/ dper na/ na mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/ 'bying ba ma yin/ zhum pa ma yin//
41b7(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma yin/ 'gro ba ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rnam par ma yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ ba spu'i bu ga gcig
41b8(mdo sde): tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang / de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i sems skye ba gcig tu mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
42a1(mdo sde): 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
42a2(mdo sde): 'das gom pa gcig spyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams 'da'o// sangs
42a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par bskal pas spyod de/ du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing
42a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sems bskyed pa bzhin du/
42a5(mdo sde): bskal par gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu phra ba'i rdul mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gnas shing / tshad med pa/ 'khor yug
42a6(mdo sde): chen po'i rdo rje'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur ba dang / mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rdul dang rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par 'das
42a7(mdo sde): shing / ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gags par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga gcig pa de ltar sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad de/ sems can thams cad ji snyed pa
42a8(mdo sde): spu'i bu gar gyur la/ de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur la/ sems can de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i
42b1(mdo sde): bskal par 'dzin te/ ji ltar sor mo gcig gi dang por 'dzin pa de ltar sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin kyang / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mnyel/
42b2(mdo sde): ba yang mi mnga'/ thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phrar gcig tsam yang mi skye'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
42b3(mdo sde): thams cad re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / na mkha' la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /
42b4(mdo sde): de lta na na mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi mtha' 'jug pa dang / skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du 'jug pa dang / skra rtse re re'i
42b5(mdo sde): mtha'i tshad kyi grangs kyi namakha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i sgra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi na mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis/ de bzhin
42b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' bskal pa zad cing 'das kyi bar du/ phyogs dang phyogs na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhags/
42b7(mdo sde): shing yongs su longs spyod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bzhi pa'o//
42b8(mdo sde): gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / dbu du mar gyur la/ dbu gcig la
43a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod/
43a2(mdo sde): med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyis yan lag gsung dang / sgra dang gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad/ sems kyi kham
43a3(mdo sde): la go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang gsung re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
43a4(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde dam pas rab tu bshad la/ mdo sde re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston
43a5(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'brang la/ chos bstan pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos dang tshig dang / 'byed pa rnams
43a6(mdo sde): kyi brjod du 'gro ste/ ji ltar gang gi phyir chos ston pa de ltar chos thams cad ston te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
43a7(mdo sde): pa'i bskal par ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs su zad nas/
43a8(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ston par ston te/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams
43b1(mdo sde): cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par zad/
43b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad pa dang / tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
43b3(mdo sde): pa ni de ltar ma yin no// chos thams cad 'gal ba'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing / chos thams cad shes rab kyis ston te/ brda' sprod cing the tshom thams
43b4(mdo sde): cad gcod pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos zad pa med pa'i mdzod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
43b5(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i
43b6(mdo sde): rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad lnga ye shes kyi sgron ma
43b7(mdo sde): chen po'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen pos rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas
43b8(mdo sde): gcig gi sku'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sprin chen po yang / dpe thams cad kyi dper bya ba ma yin te/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus/
44a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang / na mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs
44a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas
44a3(mdo sde): kyi sprul pa dang / ji srid du tha ma'i mtha'i' bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i re re ba de snyed kyi
44a4(mdo sde): dbur gyur pa'i sku'i kun tu brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la/ de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang
44a5(mdo sde): sku dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sgra dang gsu
44a6(mdo sde): re res de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams rab tu 'chad de/ mdo sde re re la de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la/ chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi chos kyi tshig
44a7(mdo sde): dang / 'byed pa brjod pa 'gro ste/ chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lusaH
44a8(mdo sde): pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer ba yang med/ nyams pa yang med/ 'ad pa yang med/ dmas pa yang med de/ de ltang tha ma'i
44b1(mdo sde): mtha'i bskal pa'i rab tu gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i/
44b2(mdo sde): chos lnga pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi dpal be'u yi rgyan dang ldan zhing / rdo rje'i snying pos bzung ba/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung
44b3(mdo sde): du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi sdig can gyi gzugs sna tshogs dgrad cing mi sdug pa/ mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/
44b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'i gzugs// mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul par byed do// byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas/ chos
44b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbyings na mkha'i mthar bdud kyi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'joms pa/
44b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o// de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub shing drung du gshegs nas/ thams cad gzigs te/ gzigs nas/ mi bsnyengs
44b7(mdo sde): bag mi tsha ba spu 'ga' yang mi g.yo// gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang mi byed/ sems phra mo yang mi mnga' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo
44b8(mdo sde): mi bskyod mi 'gyur/ rnam par mi rtog shin tu rab tu zhi/ bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/ 'dod pa dang khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi
45a1(mdo sde): mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong / dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa/ bag mi tsha
45a2(mdo sde): ba'i thugs dbyer mi byed pa'i snying po'i thugs mi bsngags shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis/ bdud dang bdud kyi lha thams cad dang / bdad kyi sde mang
45a3(mdo sde): po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis mi non cing gzungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul gsum dang /
45a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
45a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas
45a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing / de dang de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing / sems can rnams 'dul ba'i
45a7(mdo sde): dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri lo thogs pa med de/ ri rab lhun po la mi thogs/ rin po che'i ri la ma yin/ khor yug dang / khor yug chen
45a8(mdo sde): bo la ma yin/ lha'i gnas la ma yin/ klu'i gnas la ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin/ dri za'i gnas la ma yin/ lha ma yin gyi gnas la
45b1(mdo sde): yin/ na mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/ mi 'am ci'i gnas la ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas la ma yin zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro// gal te
45b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na yang mi chags te/ 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra
45b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la/ de bzhigs pas brjod pa'i sgras sgrib par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul sems can rnams kyi rna bar rig ste/ gang 'di rna bas rnam
45b4(mdo sde): par rig cing / rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang / 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di ni sangs
45b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs brjod
45b6(mdo sde): du med pa'i yang brjod du med bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
45b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan gcig dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/ bdag gri med pa'i thams cad la gnas pa/ nang dang phyi dang ldan pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa la
45b8(mdo sde): brtsams pa thams cad rnam par phye bzhi pa gnas pa med pa/ rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa/ ngo bo thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes gnas pa 'gags pa
46a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin 'od gsal ba shin tu yongs su dag pa/ rtsom pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mtha'
46a2(mdo sde): med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba/ chos
46a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba/ 'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tshad dang / tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang /
46a4(mdo sde): mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags pa dag gi lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing / chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing
46a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu'i rgyan dang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa/ thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos da ma dang / chos
46a6(mdo sde): thams cad ston pa/ 'gal ba med pa dus gsum dbyer med pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol tu song ba/ chos thams
46a7(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par bye chos thams cad kyi tshul dran cing kun nas gti mi mug pa/ zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mo'i phyogs
46a8(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo med bcu rdul yul la mi gnas par brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba ye shes kyi lta ba/ chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa
46b1(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol ba/ shes rab rnam par grol ba/ shin tu rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi
46b2(mdo sde): zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/ rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/ sems kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sem
46b3(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs
46b4(mdo sde): brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang yul tshad med
46b5(mdo sde): mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku/ khams gsum gyis ma gos pa'i sku/ rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig
46b6(mdo sde): cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la/ byin gyis brlabs kyi sku'i tshogs ston pa/ mi bden pa mi brdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/ 'ong ba
46b7(mdo sde): dang 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa/ 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku/ mtshan nyid gcig dang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ yul
46b8(mdo sde): na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/ tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku/ sku
47a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/ chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ mtha' yas par sna
47a2(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku/ bya ba sna tshogs med pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku/ sems can gyi khams ma lus
47a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad la khyad par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa/ mi g.yo mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag la/ med pa dang med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang tshul ma yin
47a4(mdo sde): pas bye ba'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing / 'dul ba'i sku/ 'gags pa dang 'gags pa ma yin pa dang / 'dul
47a5(mdo sde): ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad 'byung ba'i bsgreng ba'i sku/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / de bzhin nyid 'das pa'i sku/
47a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i sku/ thogs pa med pa'i sku/ sa thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/
47a7(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings dag pa/ 'jigs rten gyi thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku/ brtsam pa'i las mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tham
47a8(mdo sde): cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ kun phra ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang / sangs
47b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chud pa de bzhin gshegs
47b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/ spyod pa las mngon par byung ba/ smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
47b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes/ bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang
47b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi chung ba/ spyod pa
47b5(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dka' ba ma yin pa/ spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing / spyod pa thams cad rnam par
47b6(mdo sde): dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyod pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams cad la gnas pa spyod
47b7(mdo sde): yul mtha' yas pa/ lam thams cad ston pa lam ma yin pa'i yul dang / lam thams cad la zhugs pa ye shes mchog gi stobs kyis chog shes pa
47b8(mdo sde): 'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa dge ba 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i
48a1(mdo sde): ye shes shin tu yongasu dag pa lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa stong gsum yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pa rnyed pa dang /
48a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ thams cad
48a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa la gnas pa tshad med par ston par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes kyis
48a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad ye shes kyi mthong ba phra ba ma lus pa/ mtha' dang dpung
48a5(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes/ dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang / phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa
48a6(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brjod du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i ye
48a7(mdo sde): shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/ grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis chos yi ge med par rab tu rtogs pa/ brjod du med pa'i yi ge sna tshogs rnam par ldan zhing /
48a8(mdo sde): yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa/ ye shes kyis dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim pa/ sems kyi
48b1(mdo sde): skad cig ma cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes ji ltar bos pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye
48b2(mdo sde): mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba
48b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus thams cad dang / dus gsum sems kyi skad cig ma cig la chags pa
48b4(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes kyis mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul mi 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa
48b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yid kyis mtsham su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing / yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas
48b6(mdo sde): pa sems can gyi sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad/ rtogs pa des gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs
48b7(mdo sde): rgyas shing / mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med
48b8(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad 'gro
49a1(mdo sde): ba dang / khong du chud pa ma lus pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs/
49a2(mdo sde): rgyas pa/ rnam par chud pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/
49a3(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang dpung med par gnas pa/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi skra/ mtha' dang dpung med par gnas pa/ sems chags pa
49a4(mdo sde): med par gnas par/ gnas pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor bar gnas pa/ dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos ston par gnas pa ste/
49a5(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di
49a6(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bcu ste/ sems can thams cad dang / 'das
49a7(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o// kye rgyal
49a8(mdo sde): ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ci tsam par dga' ldan na
49b1(mdo sde): bzhugs shing tshe zad nas 'pho bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur bzhags pa'i tshe ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49b2(mdo sde): rnams mngon par 'byung zhing 'byung bar bzhed pa'i thugs kyis bzhags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhags shing /
49b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems kyi skad cig ma cig la sangs rgyas
49b4(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs nas byang chub nas bzhags shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul bar
49b5(mdo sde): ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dal ba'i dus ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49b6(mdo sde): rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus ji ltar ba bzhin du ston te/ brda' sbed cing bzhags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du//
49b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams brda sprod cing bzhags pa dang /
49b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skad cig la sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dris pa rnams skad cig la brda sprod cing bzhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas
50a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhugs pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzigs ma thag tu/
50a2(mdo sde): myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can ngan par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gzigs
50a3(mdo sde): ma thag tu de dag myur du bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu/ myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par lhag
50a4(mdo sde): par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
50a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu/ myur du mtho ris su skyes pa rnam par dag par so sor thob par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
50a6(mdo sde): rnams/ sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du nem nur dang yid gnyis 'dzom par nye bar gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
50a7(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i sems can gzigs ma thag tu/ phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems can rgyan chen po la dad pa dang / sangs rgyas
50a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro ba byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang / sangs
50b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsha' mar bzhags pa gzigs ma thag tu dmigs par lta ba dang / gsha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs/
50b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang /
50b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du sgribs pa thams cad zad par mdzad du gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
50b4(mdo sde): 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du snang ba so sor rnyed cing zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs pa la spobs pa rtsom par mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal
50b5(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom
50b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa
50b7(mdo sde): rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i yang rjes su
50b8(mdo sde): dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bco
51a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrubs pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs/
51a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
51a3(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
51a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /
51a5(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang rjes su dgengs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
51a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
51a7(mdo sde): bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
51a8(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba lngas
51b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang / las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang /
51b2(mdo sde): rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'brel zhing stsogs pa yang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig gcig la mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
51b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems
51b4(mdo sde): can rnams 'dal zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi
51b5(mdo sde): dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems
51b6(mdo sde): kyis/ mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bas
51b7(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba dang / dad pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba'i ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas lta ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs
51b8(mdo sde): mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
52a1(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas/ sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'dems shing rjes su bsten pa dang /
52a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi thams cad 'gro zhing / sems can gyi skad cig ma la
52a3(mdo sde): de dang de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la/ sangs
52a4(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran stong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du
52a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang / gzugs kyi sku kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
52a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag
52a8(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos
52b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag
52b2(mdo sde): med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum thams cad la
52b3(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug cing / sems kyi skad cig ma mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing / gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med
52b4(mdo sde): bcu rdul yal thams cad kyi phyogs kyi rgyal mo thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rims dang zhing thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / zhing mi zad
52b5(mdo sde): pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa la snyoms par
52b6(mdo sde): bzhugs shing / skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dbyings ma
52b7(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad dang / lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su bsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas
52b8(mdo sde): dang / mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos thams
53a1(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma
53a2(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing / skad cig ma la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos
53a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i med bcu rdul yal thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par bzhugs shing / skad cig la
53a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su song ste/ sangs rgyas lta ba mi gcod cing / sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
53a5(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgribs pa med pa la snyoms par zhags pa dang / skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas/
53a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byin pa brnyes pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
53a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas ba
53a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul cig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa
53b1(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul cig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul
53b2(mdo sde): cig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med
53b3(mdo sde): pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
53b4(mdo sde): rab tu phra ba'i rdul cig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang / da ltar byung zhing rje ba rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul cig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
53b5(mdo sde): byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phral dang / rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
53b6(mdo sde): ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
53b7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'o// snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen
53b8(mdo sde): po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// bkra shis/ ba lar+tha/
54a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa sa ng+yas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bzhug s+ho//
54b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bud d+ha ba la d+ha na/ pra ti har+ya bi kun rba na nir de sha na ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs/
54b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i des cig
54b3(mdo sde): na/ bcom ldan 'das chu bo chen po'i klung ne ran dza ni'i 'gram na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa dang /
54b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun ston dang / rab 'byor dang / sha ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa/ nyan thos chen po thams
54b5(mdo sde): cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim
54b6(mdo sde): bdag thams cad kyis bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis tshim par byas/
54b7(mdo sde): bskul gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos/ grong khyer ba
54b8(mdo sde): ra na ser gshegs te/ ba ra na se'i shing a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe na sa cher g.yos par gyur nas/ seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bdun
55a1(mdo sde): las byas pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed tsam gyi tshad legs par smras pa/ shin tu dga' bar 'gyur
55a2(mdo sde): ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ dar gyi chun po btags shing spungs pa/ lha'i na bza' brgya stong du ma bting ba/ lha'i me tog gi chun po byi ba du mar rab tu sbyangs pa/
55a3(mdo sde): lha'i dri dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa de mthong ma thag tu/ sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la
55a4(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
55a5(mdo sde): bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug khyod
55a6(mdo sde): song la/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/ khyod kyis 'dul bar gyur pa'i sems can snyigs ma'i rang bzhin
55a7(mdo sde): can/ ma dad pa/ sdig pa spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis bsgribs pa/ mar mi shes pa/ par mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/
55a8(mdo sde): bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad pa/ de dag thams cad lag na rdo rje dang / gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
55b1(mdo sde): kyi shugs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
55b2(mdo sde): lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa las tshig 'di thos nas sems can thams cad la blta ba dang / yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
55b3(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// de nas lus
55b4(mdo sde): las 'od zer brgya stong du ma byung ngo // byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man cad
55b5(mdo sde): gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs kyis khyab pa man cad du snang bar byas te/ 'od zer de dag las kyang yang dag par rab tu bskul ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung //
55b6(mdo sde): bag yod pa dang nyon mongs med par byos// bag med pa'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig/ skye dang rga shis gtses pa sdug bsngal te// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan par
55b7(mdo sde): 'byung bar dkon// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya grangs med du// srid pa'i rgya mtshor nges par 'khor ba dang // nyon mongs dog par rtag tu 'khor ba na// mcho ba
55b8(mdo sde): ma rungs par ni skrag mi 'gyur// rnyed dang chags dang bud med rtag pa min// rtag tu klu gar sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan// bskal pa du mar bde ba myongs nas kyang /
56a1(mdo sde): rgyas byis ni sdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur// rnam par slu bar gyur pa 'di la ltos// 'di la mar gyur pa yang chung mar 'gyur// de'i/
56a2(mdo sde): sha dag yongasu zos nas kyang // mi mkhas pa dag mi shes dga' bar 'dzin// srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba de// mis ni ma myong med la skrag pa med//
56a3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis ni dam pa chos 'chad kyis// bde bar gshegs la mchod par 'dod rnams deng // mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba de mthong nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba sgom pa thob 'gyur
56a4(mdo sde): gyis// de phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtshor mi gang rnams// skrag par gyi sa la thar par dod par byos// mi rnams kyis ni dam pa de la mchod// gzhan gyi srog ni ma gcod de bzhin du//
56a5(mdo sde): gzhan gyi nor dag ma byin len ma byed// gzhan gyi bud med dag la mche ma byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos// nga rgyal rgyags dang brlang ba spangs nas kyang //
56a6(mdo sde): ba ra na ser zhes ni bya ba'i// a mra srung ba mo'i tshal du deng // mi mchog la ni myur du blta bar gyis// de'i bkod pa rgya cher yid du 'ong // dge slong dge 'dun rtag
56a7(mdo sde): tu rdzu 'phrul ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen rdzu 'phrul che// sems can mi mkhas khong du chud bya dang // sems can bye ba mang po zar bya'i phyir// 'od
56a8(mdo sde): zer rtag tu gang gis btang ba de// mtshan ni spyan ras gzig spu dbang phyug go// gang dag nga rgyal rgyags khengs 'gying 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas chos la rim gro mi byed pa/
56b1(mdo sde): lag na rdo rje mgon po sems can mchog/ rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhing go bar byed// de'i gzugs ni yangs shing rdzu 'phrul che// bskal pa bye bar de ni bshad mi/
56b2(mdo sde): rdzogs// 'dir ni bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i phyir// dri dang phreng ba gos mchog rgyan khyer na// mi'i 'dren pa 'di la mchod pa byos// sangs rgyas 'byung
56b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba rab dkon no// 'dod phyir bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // rtag tu sdug bsngal thob cing thob par 'gyur// mkhas pas rtag tu thar par 'dod
56b4(mdo sde): bar gyis// mi mchog sangs rgyas la mchod pa byos// bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang // pha ma chung ma bshes mang skye bo rnams// thams cad sgyu ma 'dra
56b5(mdo sde): bas don med de// rtag par gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur// de ltar gser dang dngul yang klog dang 'dra// 'di la snying po 'ga' yang snang ba med// byang chub
56b6(mdo sde): go 'bang thob par bya ba'i phyir// mi rnams 'dren pa la ni mchod pa byos// de nas de'i tshe na 'od zer las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba gcig nas gcig tu
56b7(mdo sde): brgyud pa 'dis// stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams smras gang bar gyur nas/ sems can thams cad la bskul bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag log par
56b8(mdo sde): lta bar gyur pa de dag ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod par gyur/ gang dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa dang / 'gying ba de dag ni nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang /
57a1(mdo sde): sa khengs pa rnams dang bral bar byed par gyur// gang dag 'dod chags la rjes su spyod cing / bag med par gyur pa de dag ni/ 'dod chags
57a2(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur/ gang dag srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag
57a3(mdo sde): thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/ thams cad kyang rgod pa dang / ku re dang / dga'
57a4(mdo sde): ba dang / rtse ba dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / phra dog dang / chags pa yongs su spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bstan pa dang /
57a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba la spro bar gyur/ thams cad kyi chos nyan par 'dod par gyur to// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
57a6(mdo sde): namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po 'khar gyi bdag po dang / rgyal
57a7(mdo sde): phran dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang de dag thams cad kyis
57a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / sil snyan
57b1(mdo sde): dang / dar gyi chun po rnams thogs te/ grong khyer chen po ba ra na se zhes bya ba ga la ba dang / a mra srung ba mo'i tshal gang na ba der dong nas/ bdag bdag
57b2(mdo sde): gi bsod nams las skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la mngon par mchod de/ me tog gi char dang / dri'i char
57b3(mdo sde): chen po mngon par phab bo// de nas de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / a mra srung ba mo'i tshal de dpag tshad khrag khrig brgya stong dum srid durgya
57b4(mdo sde): che bar byin gyis brlabs te/ sa gzhi lag 'thil ltar mnyam la/ lha'i yid du 'ong ba kha tog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa dang / lha'i me tog gi shing dang /
57b5(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing / spos kyi shing dang / rin po che'i shing dang / dpag bsams kyi shing dang / gos kyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i seng ge'i khri dang
57b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ rin po che dang / dar dang / me tog gi chun po rab tu sbyangs pa/ lha'i dril bu'i sgras brgyan par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
57b7(mdo sde): gyi khams bzhin du yid 'phrog par byed pa/ tshim par byed pa/ mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang
57b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge
58a1(mdo sde): rgyas gos/ @#slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du de dag gis gang /
58a2(mdo sde): bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de
58a3(mdo sde): las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
58a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba ni mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // /
58a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang /
58a6(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang /
58a7(mdo sde): khyim bdag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
58a8(mdo sde): kyi bu legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mang //
58b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu dang / ji ltar 'dul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa mkhyen pa nas/
58b2(mdo sde): chos ston to// sems can kha cig ni byang chub sems dpas 'dul/ kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/ kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/ kha cig ni lhas
58b3(mdo sde): 'dal/ kha cig ni brgya byin gyis 'dul/ kha cig ni tshangs pas 'dul/ kha cig ni klus 'dul/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul/ kha cig ni rgyal pos 'dul/
58b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul/ kha cig ni chos nyan pas 'dul/ kha cig ni cho 'phrul gyis 'dul/ kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul/
58b5(mdo sde): kha cig ni ring bsrel gyis 'dul/ kha cig ni mchod rten byed du bzhug pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa dang / skyed mos tshal byed du bzhug pa'i dge ba'i
58b6(mdo sde): rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/ kha cig ni sku gzugs byed du bzhug pa dang / ri mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / ra gan gyi sku gzugs byed du bzhug
58b7(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/ kha cig ni dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/
58b8(mdo sde): kha cig ni mdo sde 'dri ba dang / 'drir gshug pa dang / klag pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/ kha cig ni mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang /
59a1(mdo sde): byug pa dang / do shal la sogs pa brgyan pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul ba yin te/ don dam pa la mkhas pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang /
59a2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi gsan/
59a3(mdo sde): pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ 'ongs pa yang mkhyen ma 'ongs pa yang mkhyen/ 'das pa yang mkhyen/ da ltar byung ba yang mkhyen//
59a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang mkhyen/ spyod pa yang mkhyen/ khams kyang mkhyen/ skye ba yang mkhyen/ 'byung ba yang mkhyen to// kye rgyal ba'i bu/
59a5(mdo sde): dag 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa/ legs par bslabs pa/ tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad pa thams cad la mkhas 'ches shing khams thams cad la mkhas la/
59a6(mdo sde): sman dang yo byad sbyor ba la brtson pa ni/ sems can nad pa nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba rnams kyi khams kyang shes/ dus kyang shes/ chos kyang shes/
59a7(mdo sde): sman yang shes/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / khrag las gyur pa dang / ma zhu
59a8(mdo sde): kha las gyur pa dang / skran dang / dmu rdzing dang / snying nad dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'bras la sogs pa dang / dug dang / me dpal la sogs
59b1(mdo sde): pa yang shes so// de thams cad shes nas/ sman gyi rdzas sna tshogs kyis skyug pa dang / bkru ba dang / phye ma sbyar ba dang / sna nas blugs pa'i las dang /
59b2(mdo sde): tar ka gdab pa dang / mar dang / 'bru mar bskol ba dang / smin par bya ba rnams sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sems can thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing / nad sna
59b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul
59b4(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / lha'i mig dang / rna ba rnams kyi de'i tshe rig pa yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan te/ sems can gyi khams dang /
59b5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs la mkhas pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs
59b6(mdo sde): pa'i nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas sgribs pa dang / chags pa dang / mya ngan dang / 'jigs pa dang /
59b7(mdo sde): khro bas sgribs pa rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas nas yongs su
59b8(mdo sde): thar par bya ba'i phyir/ thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pas sems can
60a1(mdo sde): / @#rnams yongs su grol bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la bkod nas/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan
60a2(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad do// mi dge ba'i chos brgyad las yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad cing / 'phags pa'i lam
60a3(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa la so sor 'god de/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ ji ltar khams kyi dge
60a4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag nyid mi snang ba yang ston/ zla ba kham pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor kyang ston/ zla ba mar gyi ngo dang / yar
60a5(mdo sde): gyi ngo yang ston/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa yang ston/ mun nag thibs po thams can kyang rnam par sel/ rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
60a6(mdo sde): 'bru la sogs pa yang sim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sa sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa'i sems
60a7(mdo sde): can rnams dang / khA sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston/ skye ba yang ston//
60a8(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ston/ rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / bud med kyi gzhad dgad dang / ku re dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / dga' zhing rtse ba yang
60b1(mdo sde): ston/ khyim nas 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa rnams kyang ston/ bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ chos kyi
60b2(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i char phab pas sems can rnams tshim par byas pa'i bar du yang ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sbyor ba sna
60b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis ring bsrel mchod pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / sku gzugs byed du bzhug pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir khyim nas 'byung ba
60b4(mdo sde): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha don du bya ba la spro ba bskyed pa de dag gis kyang sems can thams
60b5(mdo sde): cad thar par mdzad/ bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / brtul shugs dang / sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rnams 'dzin du gzhug pa'i
60b6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa'i kyang sems can rnams thar bar mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
60b7(mdo sde): mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par mdzad nas/ chos nyan pas tshim par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
60b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bkod do// de nas de'i tshe na lha'i bu blo chung ba kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
61a1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad de/ sku che shin du ring por
61a2(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
61a3(mdo sde): dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrul pa rnams las yongs su thar par mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba'i mdzad pa
61a4(mdo sde): thams cad da dang ma mdzad kyi kyang / 'di mya ngan las 'da' ba la shin du sngags shing brjod de/ 'khor mang po bsdus nas rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i
61a5(mdo sde): cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa las nang / de ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di myur ba nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa lta snyam nas/ de dag yid mi
61a6(mdo sde): dga' ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur te// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad
61a7(mdo sde): ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de ltar ma sems ma swa/ yid mi dga' ba ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mang ste/
61a8(mdo sde): thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ sems can bsam pa sna tshogs dag la chos ston te/
61b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul ji ltar ngas shes pa las na/
61b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'chad par bzhed pa dang / rgyas par mdzad par
61b3(mdo sde): bzhed par mi 'gyur ram/ yang lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las
61b4(mdo sde): 'da' bar yang med/ sku tshe zad par 'gyur ba yang med/ bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med pa'i bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par de bzhin gshegs pa
61b5(mdo sde): rnams bzhags mod kyi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yang ston to// sems
61b6(mdo sde): can mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dal ba dang / ring bsrel gyis 'dal ba snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa dang / bla ma la bsti stang
61b7(mdo sde): byed par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can dag ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
61b8(mdo sde): byon pa yang med/ gshegs pa yang med do// gang gi tshe sems can rnams dge ba yongs su smin par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar 'dod pa dang /
62a1(mdo sde): mchod par 'os pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye'o//
62a2(mdo sde): mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gsal bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung
62a3(mdo sde): mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba med de/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba yang med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin du legs par byis
62a4(mdo sde): pa la gzugs sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur/ mi snang bar yang 'gyur mod kyi gzugs brnyan ni der 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar snang ba ni med de/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs
62a5(mdo sde): pa'i sku la yang de ltar blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed la legs par brlabs pa ni/ grong khyer dang / rta babs dang / skyed mo cha la/
62a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba sna tshogs bstan te/ mi snang bar byed kyang de la 'pho ba yang med/
62a7(mdo sde): 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la blta bar bya'o// yang lha'i bu dag
62a8(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong len pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal par lon pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal
62b1(mdo sde): kha bye bar lon yang sems can rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du bzhag pa dang / sku gzugs byed du bzhug
62b2(mdo sde): ba dang / mtshan nas brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa byed pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa rnams mthar par mdzad de/
62b3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dad 'gro'i gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad dang /
62b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar par mdzad nas/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
62b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur na/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na za dang / rgyan rnams kyi mchod
62b6(mdo sde): pas mchod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha'i bu dag gang sems can la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba
62b7(mdo sde): lon yang / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes mtshan nas lan bdun du brjod nas/ na mkha' la me tog gtor na de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed
62b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// me tog na mkha' la gtor ba lta zhog gi/ gang dag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i/
63a1(mdo sde): phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa cig tsam 'dzin tam/ nyin cig gam/ mtshan cig gam/ yud tsam zhig de bzhin
63a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa yid la byed par rtson na/ de sdug bsngal mthar byas nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
63a3(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhad dgad dang / dku re 'am/ byis pa'i rkyal ka 'am/ rtsed mor yang yang byed pa
63a4(mdo sde): 'am/ 'jim pa las mchod rten byed na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal mthar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs//
63a5(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ gang gis ring bsrel gyi mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi sku gzugs byas te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje ba gtso bor
63a6(mdo sde): shes nas/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol lo snyam ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed nas/
63a7(mdo sde): lha'i spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / sil snyan dang / gdags dang / rgyal mtshan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
63a8(mdo sde): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don
63b1(mdo sde): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
63b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs/
63b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam la mkhas shing / 'thun pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ kye ma'o 'jam dpal
63b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni shes rab chen po dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thabs mkhas pa ni lags na/ gang 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
63b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye ba du ma len yang 'jig rten gyi 'ams dag na bzhugs shing / thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin
63b6(mdo sde): bar mdzad do zhing smras pa de lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam mo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas 'di skad ces smras so//
63b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag legaso legs so// yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ khyod kyis yid la byed pa skyes pa 'di dang / sngar zhus par gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
63b8(mdo sde): gyis brlabs yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs bcug bud can dang / thabs/
64a1(mdo sde): saHsa/ cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / 'od dpag
64a2(mdo sde): tu med pa de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas/ nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpar
64a3(mdo sde): bcas pas bskor cing / 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu la chos ston par snang ba dang / shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang
64a4(mdo sde): na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa du ma'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas/ chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa mngon
64a5(mdo sde): par mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha'i bu de dag mang por gyur to// mchog de dga' zhing yid mgu pa skyes nas/ bdag
64a6(mdo sde): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang /
64a7(mdo sde): byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// e ma ye
64a8(mdo sde): shes ye shes che// ting 'dzin dang ni shes rab bsgom// ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// 'das nas bskal pa du ma na// sems can rnams la phan
64b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// dpa' bo chen po 'di na bzhugs// byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor cing // seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gda'// sangs rgyas mthong ba legs
