64b2(mdo sde): pa ste// chos mnyan pa yang legs pa yin// dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang // mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin// gang dag 'dir ni bslab 'dzin
64b3(mdo sde): pa'i// lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub pa dang // de kun byang chub thob par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams//
64b4(mdo sde): 'dir ni sems can thar bar mdzad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang // de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra// 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang // de bzhin gshegs
64b5(mdo sde): pas ston par mdzad// mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang // sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang // mchod dang bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir// gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa//
64b6(mdo sde): byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams// thams cad thar pa thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas// dam pa'i chos ni mnyan pa dang // mchod cing
64b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin te// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang // rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yang dag par
64b8(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags drug khri bzhi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags nyi khris chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/
65a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu lnga stong gis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to//
65a2(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nu ro pa la rgyal
65a3(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba'i sras khyed kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du dris pa'i lan bshad pa 'di ni/ khyod kyis legs par
65a4(mdo sde): bshad de legs mod kyi/ kho bo the tshom du cung zad cig skyes kyis/ gang thos nas sems can rnams kyis yid la byas te/ de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug
65a5(mdo sde): bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar kho
65a6(mdo sde): bos dris de bstan cing lung ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
65a7(mdo sde): gyi brlabs kyis spobs pa skyes pa ni legs so// khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
65a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa tsam dang / mchod pa dang bkur ba sti byas pa nyid kyis sdig pa byed pa'i sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba
65b1(mdo sde): dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams/
65b2(mdo sde): ni gang na bzhugs/ de dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur
65b3(mdo sde): ba dang / gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur ba'i/ bcom ldan
65b4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing bsti stang bya ba bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya snang
65b5(mdo sde): ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho la bzhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod//
65b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams cug phud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tsug bud can zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig
65b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten
65b8(mdo sde): gyi khams zhi ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams pade
66a1(mdo sde): @pa can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten
66a2(mdo sde): gyi khams pad mo'i bla ma na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje
66a3(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhris pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig
66a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rtogs pa dang //
66a5(mdo sde): blo gros su ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bral ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song
66a6(mdo sde): thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten
66a7(mdo sde): gyi khams dbang po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod do// de'i mtshan bzung ba nyid kyis lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
66a8(mdo sde): gyi khams zla ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs thams cad yongs su grol bar
66b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing
66b2(mdo sde): mchod pas ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
66b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar mthong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas 'jig rten pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mdor/
66b4(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
66b5(mdo sde): bdad thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'dzem pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa cug rlan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
66b6(mdo sde): log par dad sel dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung dang / rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya
66b7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan
66b8(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang / ri mo dang sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang /
67a1(mdo sde): byug pa rnams kyi sa mchod cing bkur ba sti byas pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / brtul shugs dang / dka' thub dang / sdom
67a2(mdo sde): pa dang / nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song thams cad dang / ngan 'gro thams cad dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar
67a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
67a4(mdo sde): ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'bab nas rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te rigs kyi bu
67a5(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa dag la skur pa 'debs
67a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rku ba dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gro ba dang /
67a7(mdo sde): ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / grogs po dang / gnyen rnams yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ri
67a8(mdo sde): mo'i sku gzugs dang / 'jim pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug cing / byed du bcug nas kyang / sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems gtso bor byas te/
67b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bcwo lnga'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
67b2(mdo sde): la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mtshan lan gsum
67b3(mdo sde): nyin lan gsum du mchod de/ sems can de dag thar par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis
67b4(mdo sde): ni mkhyen/ lha'i sil snyan gyis ni gsan/ lha'i spyan gyis ni gzigs shing / sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi
67b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / legs par bya ba byed kyi/ ngan par bya ba mi byed par yongs su sngo zhing / de ltar sems can ngan song du skyes pa de dag thar par bgyi ba'i slad
67b6(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba gdab bo// bshags pa dang / mthol bas sdig pa bsrabs par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
67b7(mdo sde): zos par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur cig/ ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
67b8(mdo sde): bar sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdag gi spyod pa dang / mthun par spyod par byar cig ces de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rje
68a1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / mchod pa de'i phyir sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi smon
68a2(mdo sde): lam gyi mthus/ sems can mnar med par 'gro ba dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa de dag gi rna bar mtshan rnams thos par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam
68a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i mthus kyang sdig pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gzi brjid kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus
68a4(mdo sde): dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nas/ phyis sdig pa'i las byed par mi 'gyur te/ de nas sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur
68a5(mdo sde): zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ spyod pa mthun par 'gyur ro// /
68a6(mdo sde): de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mang po dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du bsams pa tham
68a7(mdo sde): cad bkrab ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed/ bde 'gro'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo rnams ni/
68a8(mdo sde): 'byed do/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs dang /
68b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pas/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa dag mnyan cing mchod pa cig nas gcig tu brgyud
68b2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis/ ngan song thams cad yongs su thar te/ bde 'gror bkod par gyur na/ gang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang /
68b3(mdo sde): gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar gyur na/ de'i bsod nam
68b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'ad bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i yon tan de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par brjod par sla ba ma yin no// rgyal po chen po
68b5(mdo sde): de lta bas na/ yon tan 'di dag la ltos la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// bshad par bya'o// mchod par bya'o// dkon
68b6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod cing snyen bkur bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bzung
68b7(mdo sde): bar bya'o// 'khor las yid skyo zhing bag yod pa dang / 'khor ba skad cig mar yid la byed pa dang / ldan par bya'o// yang rgyal po chen po 'dod pa la bsten
68b8(mdo sde): pas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar sdug bsngal ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'gag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug
69a1(mdo sde): bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dad 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba'i
69a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dang / gcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / brdung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ 'du byed thams cad yong su spangs te/
69a3(mdo sde): 'gro dgos pas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snying brtse ba gtso bor bya ba dang / chos dang thar pa 'dod par bya'o// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / rgyal
69a4(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal gyis 'jam dpal legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// chos kyi char phab pas bdag cag tshim par gyis/ tshim par
69a5(mdo sde): bgyis/ rangs par bgyis/ byang chub la rab tu gzhag pas bag yod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis 'di skad
69a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan lta rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa dang /
69a7(mdo sde): 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba po dang / klog pa po de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos
69a8(mdo sde): dang / rgyan rnams kyis mchod na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/
69b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de/
69b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas bcangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bstan na/ des yon tan chen po brgyad thob par
69b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang / gnod pa de dag de la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang /
69b4(mdo sde): 'byung po dang / sha zas mdangs 'brog pa de dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gshed byed dang / byad dang / sngags dang /
69b5(mdo sde): ro langs gzhan gyi gnod pa de dag de'i lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / dge slong dang /
69b6(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad de la dga' zhing yid mgu bar gyur nas/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ lha thams
69b7(mdo sde): cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rjes yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas
69b8(mdo sde): su skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan chen po de brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i
70a1(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi bar du mchod par 'gyur ro// gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs
70a2(mdo sde): pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sil
70a3(mdo sde): snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyi lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te/ brjed cing mchod pa byas gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
70a4(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu
70a5(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gzhog cing bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis ma
70a6(mdo sde): brel bar brjed cing mchod pa bas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang mnyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang /
70a7(mdo sde): 'drir 'dug pa dang / gzhan la rgyas par byed na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher brjod
70a8(mdo sde): par bya'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zhing stong bye ba gzhan du gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mkhas pa mtha' yas bye ba dag/ sems can
70b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing // den 'gro las ni sems can thar par mdzad// bstir med las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag/ las byed nas ni ngan 'gror
70b2(mdo sde): song ba rnams// de dag thar par bya phyir chos 'dod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag mchod pa gyis// ri mo mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos//
70b3(mdo sde): gser dang dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang // 'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas// mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis// me
70b4(mdo sde): tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang // mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod// shes rab che bas sngo ba dag kyang gyis// mdo sde bshad cing 'drir yang bzhug
70b5(mdo sde): par gyis// de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde gzi rjid kyis// sdig pa'i las/ sems can de thar gyis// bla med byang chub reg par 'gyur bar du// dag pa'i
70b6(mdo sde): gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur// sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing // dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur// mi'i byang chub sems dpa'
70b7(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di// bshad pa des ni bsod nams mang du thob// de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs par gyur// de'i lus 'di la ni nad mi 'byung // de'i rgyal
70b8(mdo sde): srid kun la gnod mi 'byung // khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur// gang shig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag
71a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'gyur// gang zhig mchod cing rjed dang 'drir 'jug dang // las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni// des ni sangs rgyas yang
71a2(mdo sde): dag mchod par 'gyur// des ni myur du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can
71a3(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di la the tshom skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas/
71a4(mdo sde): slar yang sdug bsngal sgrub par 'gyur ram/ 'khor bar 'khor ba'i skyo bar mi 'gyur ram/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
71a5(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gum/ ji ltar 'tsho// ji ltar bde ba sgrubs
71a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur// ji ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad ces
71a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// ltad mo can 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang 'di la gang yang skye ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'tshe ba med/ rigs
71a8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di la rga ba dang / 'chi ba ni med kyi/ 'tshe ba'i khams na rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so// yang las kyi rkyen dang / las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs
71b1(mdo sde): su 'ongs shing 'phos nas/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ bde ba yang /
71b2(mdo sde): ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du shes skyed mod kyi/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings
71b3(mdo sde): su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gyur gyi bar du skyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gos gsar pa gon te/
71b4(mdo sde): des de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang sdig bsngal yang myong bar 'gyur ro// yang dus gzhan zhig na gos de rnyings shing rmugs te/ dri ma can mthar
71b5(mdo sde): shad par gyur pa dang / des de dor ba'i chos can du shes nas bor ro// bor nas yang gos gsar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te gyon to// de gyon nas yang
71b6(mdo sde): las byed cing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar gyur nas/ don dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi mchod pa gyon par ma gyur kyi bar du/ gcig
71b7(mdo sde): nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pa du ma 'das kyang gos de dgos so zhe'am/ bor ro zhe mi rtog mi rtog gi/ de ni lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o// rigs
71b8(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin du gang tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des 'jig pa dang / 'gyel ba'i mthar gyur par mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas yang gsar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/
72a1(mdo sde): de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gis bsod nams las skyes pa'i gos
72a2(mdo sde): de 'jam pa dang sra ba dang / rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dgos pa lta bu'i lus blangs te/ ji ltar rang gi las kyi rkyen kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las
72a3(mdo sde): skyes pa bzhin du/ lha dang / rgyal po dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lus
72a4(mdo sde): de yang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis yongs su gtang yang rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o// rigs
72a5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta dper na/ sbrul ni las kyi rkyen kyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de bor nas/ rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyi 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal
72a6(mdo sde): myong bar gyur kyang / shan pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin du 'tshe ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing
72a7(mdo sde): lo ma dang 'dab mar ldan par gyur pa las/ yang dus kyi rkyen kyis 'jig pa dang ltung bar mthar gyur pa'i chos can du gyur nas/ phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu
72a8(mdo sde): dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams len te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang / 'gag par lta'o//
72b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu yang phyi ma'i dus/ phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can dag rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal mang ba dag 'byung te/
72b2(mdo sde): srang dang / gzhan pa la g.yo byed par dga' ba/ 'dod chags kyi rjes su spyod pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du
72b3(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes can dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du
72b4(mdo sde): shes can gyis/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ byis pa'i blo can de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol gyi/
72b5(mdo sde): gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la/ chos ston pa de dag bgod cing rkyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur gyi/ dad par mi byed yid ches par mi byed de/
72b6(mdo sde): de lta bu'i sems can dag ni sdig pa spyod do// de dag gi 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur ba'i bgo ba'i lus blangs
72b7(mdo sde): nas/ sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i 'du shes skyed do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin
72b8(mdo sde): bar blta ste/ 'di la su yang 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ las kyi rgyu las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang /
73a1(mdo sde): @#'gag par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' bar spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
73a2(mdo sde): mdzad nas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar yongs su gtang nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
73a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po la dkod do// de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sa chen po g.yos par
73a4(mdo sde): gyur to// ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / gzhan yang mthu
73a5(mdo sde): chen po// mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul chen po mang pos/ lha'i na bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
73a6(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes so zhes so sor bshags te/ bslab pa la yi dam bca'
73a7(mdo sde): bar bya ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag tshig 'di skad du smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba thams cad las slar log pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
73a8(mdo sde): las sgrol ba/ sgrol ba thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das slan chad bdag cag slan chad skye ba'i 'khor bar sdig bsngal myong bar
73b1(mdo sde): spro bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
73b2(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nan tan snying por byed pa'i dge ba'i
73b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba dkon mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par byos cig/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byos shig/ dam pa'i chos yongs
73b4(mdo sde): su gzung ba la spro bar byos shig/ mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / bkur sti mang bar byos shig/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bar shes par
73b5(mdo sde): byos shig/ chos smra ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes skyed par byos shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes skyed par byos shig/ chos
73b6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bya ba dang / sgom pa dang / rgyas par byos shig/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal thams cad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
73b7(mdo sde): 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i zhags pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyu ro//
73b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sgrub par byos shig/ bag med pa'i gnas las slar log par byos shig/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin ga
74a1(mdo sde): pa'i bsrab ba cag lud mam bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yangs su tham zhing/ 'di 'tha
74a2(mdo sde): 'grang ba 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang dag dgod pa dang / ku dang / dga' ba dang / srid ma rnams yidakyis yongs su spangs nas/ de bzhin ga
74a3(mdo sde): mapa na tumam pas rim 'gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas zhums te/ 'dugs pa'i rtsa bar gnas pa yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar mnas nas/ gas /
74a4(mdo sde): yang dag par drangs / spyod pa de dgang ni seng gsum du ma sti dang / 'de 'brar 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / lnga dang ma'i 'de brdzung nas sngus bsngal pa par bya
74a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lnga ci smos/ bud med kyi lus nyan mongs pa dang /
74a6(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyan mongs pas nyon spongs par gyur pa la la zhig nyin cig gam/ nyi ma phyed dam/ yud tsam yang rung ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par
74a7(mdo sde): len cing / bslab pa 'dzin par byed na/ de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rnam par/
74a8(mdo sde): zlog ste/ sdug bsngal mthar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar
74b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi yi dam 'chang ba dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang / dge ba'i
74b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na byis pa dag gis ni de mi shes so// de nas de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis
74b3(mdo sde): e ma ho e ma zhes dam pa'i sgra byung nas/ me tog dang / dri'i char chen po rab tu phab po// sems can 'bum tshang ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las 'grol
74b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// gzhan yang sems can bye ba rnams sangs rgyas dang /
74b5(mdo sde): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba yid la byed cing / sems dang po bskyed par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to//
74b6(mdo sde): de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis bcom ldan
74b7(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dbugs phyung ste/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
74b8(mdo sde): de dag gi mtshan rnams zos te/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / sgrogs pa dang / de dag gi
75a1(mdo sde): @yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ gtsugs lag khang rnams bdag cag gis lus dang / srog dang yang bsngos te bsrung bar bgyi/
75a2(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ don thams cad grub par bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams legs par grub par bgyi/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi/ nad thams
75a3(mdo sde): cad las yongs su thar par bgyi/ dran pa dang / stobs dang / spro ba rtsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin
75a4(mdo sde): nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis byos
75a5(mdo sde): shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
75a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
75a7(mdo sde): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed
75a8(mdo sde): pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog ste/ ha hi su Shash+tsa ka ra bad+d+ha de sha bistA ra b+ha wa sarba mang+ga lam//
76a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bzhug s+ho//
76b1(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya su ba kra na ta tsan ta de ba pud tra ba ri srid tsha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
76b2(mdo sde): pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhes pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
76b3(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
76b4(mdo sde): na/ dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas/ 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang //
76b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la stsogs pa/ klu'i 'khor
76b6(mdo sde): mang po rnams dang / gnod sprin gyi rgyal po lus ngan la stsogs pa/ gnod sprin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po stobs chen la
76b7(mdo sde): stsogs pa/ na mkha' sdig gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la stsogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / mi 'am
76b8(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la stsogs pa/ mi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag bzang la stsogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po
77a1(mdo sde): @#rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i lha'i
77a2(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor sto
77a3(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang bcas pa rnams dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag la stsogs pa'i 'khor
77a4(mdo sde): bzhi mang po rnams kyi yongs su bskor mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go
77a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ rab rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur
77a6(mdo sde): te 'dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo
77a7(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
77a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
77b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsod nams
77b2(mdo sde): dag gis mngon par 'phags pa lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams
77b3(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems//
77b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po// 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// thos pas don
77b5(mdo sde): la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la ston pa rnams lags//
77b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
77b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
77b8(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bdud thams cad kyis
78a1(mdo sde): @6/ @#thul bar dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams
78a2(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
78a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// blo gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
78a4(mdo sde): chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas pa dang / ma 'dres pas rnam
78a5(mdo sde): par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can char bcad pa'i slad du
78a6(mdo sde): snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la
78a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
78a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dag la/ thabs
78b1(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags/
78b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
78b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
78b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur
78b5(mdo sde): ba legs/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
78b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
78b7(mdo sde): rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang bsgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/
78b8(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79a1(mdo sde): / chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
79a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab rtsal sems legaso legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'
79a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa grangs med
79a4(mdo sde): nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shin du brtan pa/ ded dpon chen po// sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa thang bde
79a5(mdo sde): ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// /
79a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yon tan gyi khyad par de
79a7(mdo sde): dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal la zhes
79a8(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79b1(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs
79b2(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang don dang chos su mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
79b3(mdo sde): gi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po dag ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos bzhi po de dag dang
79b4(mdo sde): ldan na/ theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg pa rnams yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thabs la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs par byed pa
79b5(mdo sde): yin/ mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du chud gyur cig/ thams cad skyabs phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la/ gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par bsgrub
79b6(mdo sde): par byed gyur la/ don dang chos la shin du mkhas par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la/ byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis
79b7(mdo sde): rnam rtse na/ des ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams
79b8(mdo sde): cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus bsam pa dag pa'i rtul ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang
80a1(mdo sde): @6ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80a2(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu
80a3(mdo sde): gnas pa med gyur cing / bsam pa brnyog pa med cing yongasu dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas chos rnams/
80a4(mdo sde): 'dod cing rtag tu yongs mi skyo// gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa// de ni byang chub lam du mngon 'byung brtan 'gyur zhing // byang chub yan lag lag
80a5(mdo sde): mthil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// ring po mi thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
80a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin to// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
80a7(mdo sde): 'doms par byed pa ste/ sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub sems bskyed 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs
80a8(mdo sde): su bsngo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o//
80b1(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing / byang chub zhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing // yid dang ma bral sbrul 'dra//
80b2(mdo sde): byang chub 'dod byed la// dag pa gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni// thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rten par byed pa yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
80b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing nga
80b4(mdo sde): rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen las rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la/ gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid
80b5(mdo sde): spyod yul du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing / skye mched
80b6(mdo sde): drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yod min zhing // rten la mkhas
80b7(mdo sde): pa yin zhing de dag ltar med la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can mi stong zhing // chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nang gnas pa med// chos mchog bzhi
80b8(mdo sde): po de la shin tu rab gnas pa// shes rab pha rol phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na//
81a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin yid la rab tu sbyor
81a2(mdo sde): ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so
81a3(mdo sde): sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag thos
81a4(mdo sde): tshol ngom med tshul bzhin rtog byed cing // de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshol mi byed// nyon mongs sprin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur lta// chos nyid tha dad
81a5(mdo sde): mi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug/ che bdag chos bzhi de ston khyad par 'thob 'gyur zhing // shes rab smon 'das mun rtsal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyud// lha'i bu
81a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ zos
81a7(mdo sde): pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzugs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag
81a8(mdo sde): med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo //
81b1(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces byas te/ thos kun chung mi za ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad/
81b2(mdo sde): bdag med ston byed cing // mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud mi nyams// byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi de dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang
81b3(mdo sde): du song yang de la 'jigs pa med// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thos pas don la ston pa rnams yin te//
81b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ zos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas thos pa dang mi ldan zhing / bsgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge dang /
81b5(mdo sde): sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi las thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag ca dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir
81b6(mdo sde): thos pa yongasu tshol zhing / dga' mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don la 'jug cing / brjod pa'i don la ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag
81b7(mdo sde): dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du zos kyang don la mi rtog pas// byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu bsgrub chos nyams// srid gsum sgra skad
81b8(mdo sde): dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa// brag cha 'drar shes de las don ldan sgra thos nas// don nyid rtog cing dga' dgu nyes kun phyir mi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni
82a1(mdo sde): brtsaladon mchog yin te brjod du med// 'di na don dang sgra skad zos par 'gyur ba las// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur/
82a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi chos la ston pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mos gtam byed
82a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yid rang bzhin byang chub tu yongs bsdu/
82a4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhog pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe skye bo mang po'i dbus su song gyur pa/
82a5(mdo sde): der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom par bya//
82a6(mdo sde): des ni bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yid rang byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing // gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe// der ni dben par
82a7(mdo sde): gzhol ba rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin
82a8(mdo sde): du smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang // thos pa sgrub pa'i snying por byed pa dang // ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /
82b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis bdag zad pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems mi gtong / de dag sto
82b2(mdo sde): pa'i ras thos sgrub pa snying por byed// bka' blo bde 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug/ de ltar brtson pa'i
82b3(mdo sde): shes ldan smras bzhin byed 'gyur shing // rtag brtson mi 'dir rjes 'thun bdag med ci yang med// rtag tu snyam pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing // de ltar
82b4(mdo sde): chos spras de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la chos sra ba
82b5(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / gsungs pa dang / grol ba dang /
82b6(mdo sde): btul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan
82b7(mdo sde): las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nyes par gyur cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen
82b8(mdo sde): po la rab tu dgod par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod pas gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
83a1(mdo sde): @#sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston pa// dul bsrung legs btul shin tu mya ngan 'das nas kyang // gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs
83a2(mdo sde): ma btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor par 'jud// de dag byang chub sems bsam chos gyur cing // theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams
83a3(mdo sde): kyang 'god par byed// rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing // sems can rnams la'ang de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub sem
83a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i
83a5(mdo sde): gnas pa bzhir gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyun du rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang // lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/
83a6(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing // dben par gnas pa la yang dga' bar sked
83a7(mdo sde): byed la// shes pas zab mo'i bzod la nges pa thob gyur cing // mkhas dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa ste// de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs
83a8(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing // de dag sangs rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dra la// sems can mang po rnams kyang
83b1(mdo sde): yongs su smin byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyi thul bar dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
83b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
83b3(mdo sde): gdung mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad
83b4(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ mtshan med stong pas nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi sgom zhing / sems can yongasu bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan/ dkon mchog gsum rgyan mi gcod
83b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan pha rol phyin pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar spyod mkhas bro ldan che dag yid bzhangs pa// de dag 'dud bzhi dag
83b6(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das gyur cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams// mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed// lha'i
83b7(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug
83b8(mdo sde): pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing brnyed par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pa med pa la sems
84a1(mdo sde): #kyis nges par rtogs par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa/
84a2(mdo sde): dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' gyur la// rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam pa zhugs gyur cing // sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa
84a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan par rab gnas pa/ blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing // chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa/
84a4(mdo sde): de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis
84a5(mdo sde): mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde bas khyengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / spad pa dang /
84a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang / sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po rnams la yongasu spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongasu shes pa srung zhing
84a7(mdo sde): dben par lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed dang snyan dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni nams kyang khengs par lu/
84a8(mdo sde): ba med// ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang // de dag pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod// sems can smin par byed phyir phung po yongs spyod cing /
84b1(mdo sde): phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma rlar shes pa// sems can phan ba de'i don du 'jig rten spyod byed kyang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims spos dang ldan//
84b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la
84b3(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / sems can la sems can med pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa chags pa med pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad
84b4(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing // sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid
84b5(mdo sde): du yongasu shes gyur cing // mkhas la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod min pa'i// dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongasu spyod byed la// spyod pa med la
84b6(mdo sde): yongasu rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing // 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnam bral bas// sems can dag pa gang dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// lha'i bu
84b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob
84b8(mdo sde): pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad
85a1(mdo sde): #ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing // shes pas so so yang dag rig pa mi zad 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon
85a2(mdo sde): khor gyur cing sngon yang ni// yang dag bstsags pa yongasu dag pa thob gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i chos
85a3(mdo sde): rnams yongasu ston par byed// de dag bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin te// de phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan mda' ba byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
85a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos bzhi dang ldan na// 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong /
85a5(mdo sde): pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'ching bas bcing ba'i sems can rnams thar bar byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog
85a6(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du
85a7(mdo sde): skye ba legs pa dang / zabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces byas te/ stong nyid
85a8(mdo sde): spyod yul de dag ltas bcings grol byed cing // mtshan med gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smon pa med la gnas shing sems can
85b1(mdo sde): smin byi'i phyir// bsam bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur/ shes rab thabs kyis nges 'byung rnam thar sgor gnas kyang // 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings
85b2(mdo sde): ni das min thob mi byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lha'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa
85b3(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu
85b4(mdo sde): rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongasu shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad la nem nam med pa ste/
85b5(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing / de dag rnams kyis sgrib pa 'ga'
85b6(mdo sde): yang mthong mi 'gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtswa las rab byung bar// shes nas de las snrel zhir kun tu ston mi byed// chos 'di thams cad rang
85b7(mdo sde): bzhin bya ngan 'das pa dang // ma sa ma 'gags ma nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kun mkhyen 'das 'jal mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ !
85b8(mdo sde): nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bu thams cad kyi rgyal
86a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu byin pa mi spong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims
86a2(mdo sde): mi spongs pa dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i rgyu sgom pa mi spong ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya
86a3(mdo sde): ste/ longs spyod che rgyu sbyin pa mi spong de 'bras de// mtho ris skye rgyu tshul khrims thob cing de 'bras de// shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de 'bras
86a4(mdo sde): de// rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed cing de 'bras de// rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag ni// byang chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin
86a5(mdo sde): mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
86a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing
86a7(mdo sde): bdag tu lta bar yang mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gag par lta zhing srid pa 'gog par yang mi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang /
86a8(mdo sde): des ma / na nga kyang ba /
86b1(mdo sde): dag par shes// ma rig rtsa lag rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni// rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad skye med 'gyur
86b2(mdo sde): zhes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams
86b3(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par brtsegs pa la skyo ba med pa dang / 'khor
86b4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing /
86b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten// dge
86b6(mdo sde): ba stsogs shing 'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med// 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongasu shes//
86b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ long spyod
86b8(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa dang / chos ston pa mi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems sa dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di
87a1(mdo sde): rab rtsal#skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing // rtag tu chos kyi mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yi// de dag mngon
87a2(mdo sde): shes lnga po mi rtag mi g.yo ba// rtag tu dran ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang
87a3(mdo sde): la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tshe 'gyur zhing // byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems
87a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dra bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa
87a5(mdo sde): bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / bde ba bzhi shes pa dang / so so yang dag rig pa bzhis thob pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // /
87a6(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing / bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed la// bden pa bzhi po dag la
87a7(mdo sde): 'jigs med dpa' bo rnams// 'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol song gyur cing // 'chad dang klog pa dag la
87a8(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu byed na// de phyir de nyid yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
87b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang / tshul khrims
87b2(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrung ba dang / bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par
87b3(mdo sde): chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol
87b4(mdo sde): son// tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu nges la brtul zhugs bzang // nags dang nags rab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la// dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos kha
87b5(mdo sde): na ma the lta// gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod pa// de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur
87b6(mdo sde): la// de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge ba'i spyod pa
87b7(mdo sde): thams cad la spras pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun
87b8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yong su bsngo ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag dang dang
88a1(mdo sde): @#ldan la brtul ba brtan ldan zhing // de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang snyoms dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying
88a2(mdo sde): rje rje ldan zhing // byang chub ched du yongasu bsngo la mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge ba kun la sprad pa yod min zhing // zla ba nyid zla ba mkha' la skar ma yi// tshogs
88a3(mdo sde): kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa ltar// yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang /
88a5(mdo sde): blo rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa de dag ji skad
88a6(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa snying por byed cing blo rab gnas// gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi// lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang ldan pa 'gyur/
88a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag ston byed pa// de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang /
88a8(mdo sde): rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos la dbang sgyur bas/
88b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing / nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems
88b2(mdo sde): la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing / bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par
88b3(mdo sde): chos ston pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro// shes rab
88b4(mdo sde): stobs kyis blun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis
88b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa med// de dag sten pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
88b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang /
88b7(mdo sde): bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal med cing bla ma gus pas gnas gyur la// kun nas
88b8(mdo sde): khag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing // bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur//
89a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing // tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten
89a2(mdo sde): kun mdzad thams cad rtogs pa khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang /
89a3(mdo sde): ldan na/ thams cad du Sha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
89a4(mdo sde): par brtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos
89a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan zhing / dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes
89a6(mdo sde): rab rtse// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkhas 'dra'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan
89a7(mdo sde): zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa// de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a8(mdo sde): bzhi pa bsgrubs pa 'di bstan pa na// lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// /
89b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyis khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lnga dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams
89b2(mdo sde): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing /
89b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab cing / lha'i sil snyan dag gis lha
89b4(mdo sde): yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang // klu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang /
89b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par byas so// thams cad
89b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / a la la chos a la la chos a la la chos shes lan gsumached du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod pa ched du
89b7(mdo sde): brjod nas mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
89b8(mdo sde): dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bka' stsal gyis/ 'jam dpal
90a1(mdo sde): khyod kyang chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis shig/ ji ltar na byang
90a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub
90a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
90a4(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams
90a5(mdo sde): cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs
90a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan
90a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags
90a8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su
90b1(mdo sde): rtogs pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
90b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam
90b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa
90b4(mdo sde): lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
90b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
90b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
90b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par byed pa/ mi rnyed par byed pa lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
90b8(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don
91a1(mdo sde): ra ca/ la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
91a2(mdo sde): cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa//
91a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
91a4(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
91a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas
91a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smras pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
91a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
91a8(mdo sde): gsungs pa bzhin sbas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos
91b1(mdo sde): sba ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de/
91b2(mdo sde): lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
91b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
91b4(mdo sde): gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91b5(mdo sde): po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91b6(mdo sde): bo bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 48dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa
91b7(mdo sde): nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongasu tshol bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91b8(mdo sde): po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gting
92a1(mdo sde): cag#dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
92a2(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba
92a3(mdo sde): rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams
92a4(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
92a5(mdo sde): kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
92a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
92a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
92a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
92b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
92b2(mdo sde): dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pa lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams
92b3(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas
92b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de
92b5(mdo sde): lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das ma byas dang ma 'dres pa rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/
92b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar bcad pa'i phyir snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/
92b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta
92b8(mdo sde): bar byed la/ mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal
93a1(mdo sde): can tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang
93a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu las mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
93a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi
93a4(mdo sde): bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa
93a5(mdo sde): dang bral zhing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93a6(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing
93a7(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su
93a8(mdo sde): smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten
93b1(mdo sde): gyi tshul la spyod par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams
93b2(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'anam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin//
93b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub semam dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtog pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i
93b4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongasu dag par brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
93b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'bras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
93b6(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pas shes par byed/ lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i
93b7(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
93b8(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi/
94a1(mdo sde): @tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
94a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
94a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings mi zad
94a4(mdo sde): pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/
94a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dra bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
94a6(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
94a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
94a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
94b1(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis
94b2(mdo sde): bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la
94b3(mdo sde): smad pa med pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nam mkha' dang
94b4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smad pa med pa rnams yin no// /
94b5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
94b6(mdo sde): pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa byed pa lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
94b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
94b8(mdo sde): chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
95a1(mdo sde): / rnams bsam du med pa'i sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
95a2(mdo sde): chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
95a3(mdo sde): chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95a4(mdo sde): po rnams tshul cig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
95a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
95a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
95a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang sgrub par mi byed/
95a8(mdo sde): chos 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan rnam
95b1(mdo sde): kha thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi
95b2(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
95b3(mdo sde): bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags 'bum lhag tsam gyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal
