95b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// thams cad dang ldan
95b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di
95b6(mdo sde): skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thos par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i spobs pa ci lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa
95b7(mdo sde): mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam
95b8(mdo sde): par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no//
96a1(mdo sde): rab rtsal/ bam po gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
96a2(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dga' ba 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod chos kyi dga' ba
96a3(mdo sde): 'dod dam/ zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang / 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/
96a4(mdo sde): chos 'di ni so sor rtog pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// /
96a5(mdo sde): chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems
96a6(mdo sde): dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir bzung ba med pa yin no//
96a7(mdo sde): chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon
96a8(mdo sde): gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba
96b1(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no// chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
96b2(mdo sde): phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das
96b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu ma bstan
96b4(mdo sde): pa yin no/ chos 'di ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol
96b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir gnas med par gnas pa yin no// chos nyid 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir
96b6(mdo sde): rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang
96b7(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyis rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni
96b8(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags
97a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa yin no// chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su
97a2(mdo sde): chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi rten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no// chos 'di ni
97a3(mdo sde): bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ni
97a4(mdo sde): gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i
97a5(mdo sde): phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun
97a6(mdo sde): chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi phyed pa dang / mi snang ba'i
97a7(mdo sde): phyir na mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin no// lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dga' ba ci lta bu zhig yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i
97a8(mdo sde): dga' ba na kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu leg so leg so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dga' ba gang
97b1(mdo sde): la la lus dang / ngag dang sems kyis brtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pa yin pas de ni sems
97b2(mdo sde): rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
97b3(mdo sde): bu gzugs kyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyi
97b4(mdo sde): rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
97b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa gtan spongs pa rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa yin no// skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
97b6(mdo sde): ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems can la rten pa'i
97b7(mdo sde): bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas
97b8(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems la nges par ma bsam pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// the tshom
98a1(mdo sde): can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
98a2(mdo sde): gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino//
98a3(mdo sde): chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag pa'i spong ba'i sems
98a4(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang /
98a5(mdo sde): po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la
98a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can
98a7(mdo sde): yin no// sdug bsngal las yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems
98a8(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'gog pa la zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lam la bsgom par 'dra shes pa'i sems ni
98b1(mdo sde): sems rnyog pa can yin te/ lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no// lha'i bus/
98b2(mdo sde): spras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa dge go
98b3(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal namakha' las sems cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar na na mkha' la sems med
98b4(mdo sde): pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi sems de dang 'dra ba de ni sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas
98b5(mdo sde): de na su zhig mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa//
98b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par
98b7(mdo sde): byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa
98b8(mdo sde): yin no// mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang bdag
99a1(mdo sde): ranamed par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// man
99a2(mdo sde): ma med zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag
99a3(mdo sde): cha dang / chu zla dang / smig sgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mtshon par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin
99a4(mdo sde): no// ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba la skyon
99a5(mdo sde): med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par
99a6(mdo sde): byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lhag pa'i
99a7(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa sgrubs te gnas
99a8(mdo sde): kyang / 'gog pa la 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba med la skyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs
99b1(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing / chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba med pa dang /
99b2(mdo sde): dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu nyi khri nyis stong chos
99b3(mdo sde): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems
99b4(mdo sde): dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
99b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// khyim pa dang rab tu
99b6(mdo sde): byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag
99b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces sbas so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod cag kyang the tshom ci yod pa dag 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'ang
99b8(mdo sde): srung chen pos/ 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa/ yin
100a1(mdo sde): #la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ brdzun pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam
100a2(mdo sde): gtan byed pa de ni/ rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /
100a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam ste de skad smras/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
100a4(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni rang 'dzin pa yin/ gnas ni khams gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams
100a5(mdo sde): yin/ mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de las des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha' med pa yin/ khams gsum na mi gnas
100a6(mdo sde): par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de las bsam
100a7(mdo sde): nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang /
100a8(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/
100b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang
100b2(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang / chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum du
100b3(mdo sde): byed kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na de tsam
100b4(mdo sde): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
100b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma
100b6(mdo sde): thob la/ 'dus byas kyang ma thob la slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin
100b7(mdo sde): no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
100b8(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang / tshu rol dang / bral zhing
101a1(mdo sde): pha cagabyang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldan zhing / bya ba thams cad kyang ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis
101a2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/
101a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag
101a4(mdo sde): go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang tshig dang / yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang /
101a5(mdo sde): mthar thug par mi 'gyur na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' ches ston pa yin no// nam grus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
101a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa nam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid
101a7(mdo sde): yin par yang shes par byed la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed kyang / bsam gtan
101a8(mdo sde): la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
101b1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams
101b2(mdo sde): gtan dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed cing ltung ba dang / nyon mongs pa gdal ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par
101b3(mdo sde): yang byed la/ byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma 'gags pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal
101b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
101b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed
101b6(mdo sde): na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no// ba ku las smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po srungs
101b7(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang
101b8(mdo sde): yul med par lta na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin no// sor mo'i 'phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang
102a1(mdo sde): nal@chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/ 'jab dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma
102a2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i phyir mtshams med pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// ka ta'i bu chen pos smras pa/
102a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka ta'i bu chen po gang gi tshe/
102a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing / tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/
102a5(mdo sde): ci nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi g.yo la//
102a6(mdo sde): gnas thams cad la yang mi rten pa de lta ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no// gsus po chen
102a7(mdo sde): pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems
102a8(mdo sde): dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis so sor yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / ming dang
102b1(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na/
102b2(mdo sde): de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul
102b3(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shi
102b4(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims 'tshal ba 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
102b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin no// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun
102b6(mdo sde): dga' bo gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed cing / thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtogs par byed pa/
102b7(mdo sde): ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin par byed cing / ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no//
102b8(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ ji
103a1(mdo sde): skad bstan pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni/ chos de dag las 'ga' tsam
103a2(mdo sde): yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na khyed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/
103a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gnag rjes la brten na/ rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yin no//
103a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po las brten na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la rten na/ byang chub
103a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mchog yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu de ni nyan thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan te/ legs so leg so//
103a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no//
103a7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam te de skad smras/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas las/
103a8(mdo sde): rten na/ nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la/ nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par
103b1(mdo sde): byed pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la
103b2(mdo sde): bstod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de
103b3(mdo sde): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la bstod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam
103b4(mdo sde): te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / nyan
103b5(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma brjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan
103b6(mdo sde): gyi chos brjod par byed cing / 'di la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas/
103b7(mdo sde): lnga'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la bstod par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/
103b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de lta na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa
104a1(mdo sde): ra / ma yin pa brjod cing / nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/
104a2(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro// 'jab dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa
104a3(mdo sde): brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcos par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/
104a4(mdo sde): skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing / khams kyi rgyal po de ltar ma yin na/ de smad
104a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub
104a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' theg pa chen po la bstod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yang sma'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
104a7(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal leg so legs so// khyod kyis tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam dpal
104a8(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas ni/ theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni
104b1(mdo sde): de las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam/
104b2(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las rten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
104b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa las rten nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
104b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can
104b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyuraro//
104b6(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
104b7(mdo sde): thams cad la rten to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba las brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i
104b8(mdo sde): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ci la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba'i gnas
105a1(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas la rten pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang mngon par skags
105a2(mdo sde): yod pa dang / na mkha' la rten pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
105a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na/ lha'i bu de'i phyir chos
105a4(mdo sde): thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams
105a5(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi
105a6(mdo sde): chos yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no// zhes ston pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras/
105a7(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs med
105a8(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis/ rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can
105b1(mdo sde): thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par thugasu chud/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
105b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed//
105b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na/ ni de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam
105b4(mdo sde): par rtog pa med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang
105b5(mdo sde): chub yin no// zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
105b6(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la
105b7(mdo sde): gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la/
105b8(mdo sde): gnas pa yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang / sems la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
106a1(mdo sde): ra #de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de yang stong pas gnas/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la ma gnas pa'i
106a2(mdo sde): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
106a3(mdo sde): pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su
106a4(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis
106a5(mdo sde): su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa nyid yin gyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan med de de'i gnas pa gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang gnyis su med
106a6(mdo sde): pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis shes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
106a7(mdo sde): bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de ni gnyis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med par
106a8(mdo sde): byed pa de ni gnyis so// zhe sdang gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// gti mug dang / gti mug med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhin
106b1(mdo sde): ni gnyis su med pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// bdag
106b2(mdo sde): dang bdag med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/
106b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i
106b4(mdo sde): phyir bzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang
106b5(mdo sde): bzhin zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni bzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa
106b6(mdo sde): can pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni spros pa dang bral
106b7(mdo sde): ba dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes
106b8(mdo sde): bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi
107a1(mdo sde): shes pa dag 'o// lha'i bu 'angs dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/ lam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag kyis
107a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin shes pa dag go// khwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin/ lam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan
107a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas
107a4(mdo sde): byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la rang bzhin gyi dring mi
107a5(mdo sde): 'jog cing gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pa sbyin pa spyod par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
107a6(mdo sde): bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
107a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni des na 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun
107a8(mdo sde): ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas/ de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/
107b1(mdo sde): ba yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur/
107b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob na/ sems can rnams skyob par mi byed cing / nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro//
107b3(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyi sa yin no// 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
107b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni
107b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas la yang mi gnas/ 'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang
107b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni 'a byas las yid bskyod pa dang / 'das ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pas/ 'das byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'das ma
107b7(mdo sde): byas shes pa rtogs pa yin te/ de 'das byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'das ma byas
107b8(mdo sde): su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper ni/ mtshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par 'gyur la/ de nas mda' den pa
108a1(mdo sde): mkha' la mi gnas par 'dug cing sa la yang mi ltung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba cung zad yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/
108a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dka'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong
108a3(mdo sde): zhing / 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung zhing / 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka'
108a4(mdo sde): ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas sam/ gang las 'byung
108a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang
108a6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i
108a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
108a8(mdo sde): khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/ de ni nyan thos su 'gyur/
108b1(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
108b2(mdo sde): gang shes rab kyi shes pas/ 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / thabs kyi shes pas 'dus pa byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
108b3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sangs rgyas
108b4(mdo sde): kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub
108b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'das byas la sbyor bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags
108b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ 'das ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
108b7(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub
108b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar stsogs
109a1(mdo sde): rab rtsa/ @#par byed cing snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa
109a2(mdo sde): med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing / thabs la gnas
109a3(mdo sde): te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byam
109a4(mdo sde): pa chen po la gnas te/ chos ston par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ zang zing gi sbyin pa byin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med
109a5(mdo sde): pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su sbyong ba'i las byed cing / mya ngan
109a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa la gnas te/ 'khor ba yongs su sbyong ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan
109a7(mdo sde): yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas/ skye bar byed cing 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snang bar byed pa dang /
109a8(mdo sde): khams dang skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang 'bar bar byed cing tshig par mi
109b1(mdo sde): byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams
109b2(mdo sde): 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed
109b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bdud kyi lcags kyo shes par byed cing chos kyi lcags kyo spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes par 'jug par byed cing / thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang /
109b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing / 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar
109b5(mdo sde): byed cing chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan
109b6(mdo sde): pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos rnams kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag gi/ lha'i bu nyis khri lnga stong ni len pa med par
109b7(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang
109b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyis khri ni spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang
110a1(mdo sde): rab 2/ @chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang /
110a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin//
110a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon tu
110a4(mdo sde): yang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ zhe sdang spong ba mngon tu yang mi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed
110a5(mdo sde): la/ gti mug spong ba mngon tu yang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la/ nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon tu yang mi byed pa de tsam
110a6(mdo sde): gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la stong nyid
110a7(mdo sde): ston par yang byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon tu yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon tu
110a8(mdo sde): yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/ smon pa med pa mngon yang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la
110b1(mdo sde): byatshul khrims las yang dag pa 'da' bab/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /
110b2(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog/
110b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon yang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
110b4(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa
110b5(mdo sde): dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa
110b6(mdo sde): byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam ste de skad smras/ 'jam dpal
110b7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba
110b8(mdo sde): dang / chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems
110b9(mdo sde): dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya
111a1(mdo sde): @ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin
111a2(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des//
111a3(mdo sde): gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
111a4(mdo sde): gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la log par zhugs pa yin pas/ de nas theg/
111a5(mdo sde): pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu
111a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis brtul bar mi byed cing / ngag dang sems kyis brtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la gang de ltar chos la mngon par
111a7(mdo sde): brtson pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po dag la
111a8(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas/ de ni brjed nges pa yin la gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la
111b1(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas/ de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ rtsa dang / shing dang /
111b2(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang / lam dang mig yor dang / lug ltar lkug pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
111b3(mdo sde): dang / ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems pa dang / lug ltar lkug pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub
111b4(mdo sde): par byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
111b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol ba byed pa dang / lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing / lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub
111b6(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no//
111b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad brtsal na mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong
111b8(mdo sde): bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang
112a1(mdo sde): @#gi che/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang /
112a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par
112a3(mdo sde): byed la/ lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar ni byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu
112a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang /
112a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub yongs su bsngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir
112a6(mdo sde): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// /
112a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung
112a8(mdo sde): khar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las
112b1(mdo sde): lam yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas
112b2(mdo sde): sems can nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
112b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
112b4(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med ma ston par byed kyang / nyon mongs pa med
112b5(mdo sde): pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing / skyon med pa mngon du mi byed
112b6(mdo sde): pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po
112b7(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched yong su shes par byed pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang yong su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
112b8(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par sgrub par byed cing / sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par
113a1(mdo sde): byed kyang nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrog pa
113a2(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang /
113a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no//
113a4(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu bas
113a5(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis/ lha'i bu bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang sems mi brjod
113a6(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang /
113a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yengs pa med pa nyid
113a8(mdo sde): kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs
113b1(mdo sde): pa yod pa yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' la spyod pa dang / mtha'
113b2(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtogs pa la spyad pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa sdug bsngal
113b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtogs pa la spyod pa dang / phrin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtogs pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongasu
113b4(mdo sde): shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtogs pa spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongasu shes pa la spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du
113b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gog pas shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon par zhen
113b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongasu shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa
113b7(mdo sde): dang / du ma'i tshogs pa la spyod pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir don so sor yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir so sor
113b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / brag cha dang mtshungs
114a1(mdo sde): @/ @pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rten pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes/
114a2(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyis mdo sde la ston pa la spyod
114a3(mdo sde): pa dang / gang zag yongasu smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rten pa la spyod pa dang / lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam
114a4(mdo sde): par dag pa'i phyir lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon
114a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi byed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod
114a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas med pa la spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod
114a7(mdo sde): pa dang / thams cad du rje su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' lta bu spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/
114a8(mdo sde): phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la
114b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / bdag mi sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang /
114b2(mdo sde): khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med
114b3(mdo sde): pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar bcad pa la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam
114b4(mdo sde): par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa la spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems
114b5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// / bam po gsum pa// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
114b6(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
114b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bos ni byang chub sems gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad
114b8(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang / gang nyan
115a1(mdo sde): @thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/
115a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ston pa ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu'o//
115a3(mdo sde): bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang /
115a4(mdo sde): gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
115a5(mdo sde): dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su
115a6(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
115a7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa
115a8(mdo sde): dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang /
115b1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/
115b2(mdo sde): la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
115b3(mdo sde): gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing / 'dzin par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnam par thar par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su
115b4(mdo sde): tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su
115b5(mdo sde): 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
115b6(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan//
115b7(mdo sde): zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang /
115b8(mdo sde): chos sba ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyis/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang /
116a1(mdo sde): @chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa mi smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes 'brang /
116a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos la rten pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chag
116a3(mdo sde): pa med pa ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub
116a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
116a5(mdo sde): ba/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa'i nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang /
116a6(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyangs pa la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam des rnam par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / mi khom pa
116a7(mdo sde): brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang /
116a8(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no/
116b1(mdo sde): lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
116b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su dad pa rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang /
116b3(mdo sde): ngan song thams cad gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams
116b4(mdo sde): bcad pa dang / lha dang mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs
116b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed
116b6(mdo sde): pa dang / mya ngan 'das pa lam mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab
116b7(mdo sde): tu bye ba dang / phyir mi ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin no// lha'i/
116b8(mdo sde): bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsaM/ byang chub sems dpa'
117a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'ong /
117a2(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang /
117a3(mdo sde): 'ong yang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro
117a4(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra
117a5(mdo sde): zhing mi phyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
117a6(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams
117a7(mdo sde): su yang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba
117a8(mdo sde): dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang /
117b1(mdo sde): rga shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthar mi gnas pa dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa med pa thob pa/
117b2(mdo sde): dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
117b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing / 'dod chags
117b4(mdo sde): gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med
117b5(mdo sde): cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la
117b6(mdo sde): sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga'
117b7(mdo sde): ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / bde ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'jigs pa dang / mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis/
117b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
118a1(mdo sde): ra la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi
118a2(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshu rol dang pha rol la gnas
118a3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang / tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyis sems can gzhan thar par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
118a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
118a5(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing / yul rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i
118a6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang /
118a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis tshad med pa dang / na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs
118a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad la rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rtsom shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
118b1(mdo sde): pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang / sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yongs su shes pa dang / so so yang dag par
118b2(mdo sde): rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang /
118b3(mdo sde): so so ci rig par chos ston par byed pa dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis spyod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
118b4(mdo sde): dpa' nyan thos yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
118b5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang //
118b6(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha
118b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyobs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i byom
118b8(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrubs par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed cing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas/ byang chub mngon par
119a1(mdo sde): @rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed pa dang / nyi che ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang /
119a2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i
119a3(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpa' gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
119a4(mdo sde): cad bzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad bzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs pa byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par
119a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang bar ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par
119a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed
119a7(mdo sde): pa dang 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
119a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang /
119b1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid mi brjod pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang //
119b2(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon
119b3(mdo sde): lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongs su thar bar
119b4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dang / 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrogs par byed pa dang
119b5(mdo sde): de na yang yin la de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'di na yang yin la/ 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyis ga las dag pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu
119b6(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song
119b7(mdo sde): ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom
119b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shes bya 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang //
120a1(mdo sde): @sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang khur bor ba dang /
120a2(mdo sde): srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bstsal ba dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
120a3(mdo sde): shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam pa ma gtang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya
120a4(mdo sde): mtsho las sgrol ba dang / chu lon dang / zam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par gnas pa dang / rtag tu bsgom pa la yid kyis brtson pa dang /
120a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar klog pa
120a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
120a7(mdo sde): shes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i/
120a8(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub sems dpar byed pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang
120b1(mdo sde): phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib rnams dang / mchod pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid
120b2(mdo sde): da mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pas
120b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi
120b4(mdo sde): chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon
120b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrungs par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid
120b6(mdo sde): du lta ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba na mkha' dang mnyam
120b7(mdo sde): pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras
120b8(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang /
121a1(mdo sde): rab tu ston pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yo ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / ston pa yongs su 'dzin par
121a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad
121a3(mdo sde): kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang /
121a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par spras pa dang /
121a5(mdo sde): khams gsum pas phyag byas pa dang / sems na mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang
121a6(mdo sde): dgeng ba dang / bshung ba dang / khro ba dang / spyod pa dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang
121a7(mdo sde): bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang / 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
121a8(mdo sde): dpa' ston pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
121b1(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang
121b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod
121b3(mdo sde): chags kyi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba
121b4(mdo sde): dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par
121b5(mdo sde): gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams
121b6(mdo sde): cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
121b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i
121b8(mdo sde): khyer chags pangs rung ba dang / na nas dang / nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spang bar byed pa dang / mengs pa thams cad dang / 'du byung bams cad la thun du
122a1(mdo sde): 'du shes la/ nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar yang mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun
122a2(mdo sde): mi gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par bskyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su
122a3(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par
122a4(mdo sde): byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams la nye bar sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang / 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa dang / lha'i bu byang
122a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal
122a6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms
122a7(mdo sde): par zhugs pa de shes par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ kun du shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/
122a8(mdo sde): 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ spyod par mi byed/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na/
122b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/
122b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la/ de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar byed
122b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod
122b4(mdo sde): pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang / don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / 'dun pa zlog pa dang /
122b5(mdo sde): phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam par nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed
122b6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/
122b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bya
122b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
123a1(mdo sde): ra lanye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos
123a2(mdo sde): ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa'i me gsum gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang /
123a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yong su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa de lta na/
123a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yong su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang /
123a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog
123a6(mdo sde): chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams
123a7(mdo sde): las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la
123a8(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so so'i thob par gyur to// srog chags
123b1(mdo sde): sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /
123b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu babs so// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jas dpal gnon
123b3(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ de nas 'jam dpa
123b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa// bla med byang chub sems yin te//
123b5(mdo sde): sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni// byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing // byang chub sem
123b6(mdo sde): las rab brtas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag med cing // mi bden ya ma rla gsog tu// gang tshe shes pas shes
123b7(mdo sde): byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pa// de ni
123b8(mdo sde): thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongasu drag gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan
124a1(mdo sde): @#nyid do// nang dang yang na phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing // sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba// de na
124a2(mdo sde): thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la// lus dang ngag yid ni gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan
124a3(mdo sde): nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing // gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la// sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngon byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin/
124a4(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing // bdag med bzod pa bsgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems
124a5(mdo sde): can kun gyi khro ba dang // gsod dang 'ching ba bzod byed cing // sems can de dag mi spong ba// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sems can yongs su smin
124a6(mdo sde): bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs nas// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// tshu rol ma yin pha rol min// 'thun
124a7(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing // spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas// de ni btang snyom
124a8(mdo sde): mi byed cing // sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzung med mkhas 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing //
124b1(mdo sde): de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/ sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun
124b2(mdo sde): mchog tu 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing // mkhas dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos 'ag
124b3(mdo sde): 'dzin par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing // 'jig rten kun gyis
124b4(mdo sde): dben gyur pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing // de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo
124b5(mdo sde): ba// de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dra ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed cing // de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni
124b6(mdo sde): shes rab pha rol phyin// chos kun 'chi 'pho yod min zhing // skye ba med par shes byed la// mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//
124b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod dang gzugs rnams su// bsams bzhin du ni skye byed pa// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin/
124b8(mdo sde): dben pa gnas rab gnas byed cing // nyon mongs med la rab gnas la// bsam gtan rnam par thar ston byed// de dge shes rab mtshan nyid yin/
125a1(mdo sde): canagrong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing // mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la/
125a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las// skrag cing 'dra 'dzi bsten med la// bdag nyid dul zhing zhi gyur la// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//
125a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba dag na 'das chen dang // tshogs dang 'dra 'dzi ji snyed pa// kun na snang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin// brtan pa chags med spyod byed
125a4(mdo sde): cing // yi ge don gnyer mi byed la// brjod med nges don don gnyer ba// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// snang zhing chos
125a5(mdo sde): rnams ston byed la// dkon mchog gsum gyi sngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mngon shes shes la mkhas gyur cing // zhi zhing dul la zag
125a6(mdo sde): pa med// bdeg med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams byed par 'gro byed la// sangs
125a7(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // nyon mongs dngos med shes byas nas// de dag bdud kun zhi gyur
125a8(mdo sde): pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// bdud rnams thams cad ston byed cing // gtan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la// de las sems can thar byed pa// de ni
